arabic.title: 180 daraga (مية وتمانين درجة)
text: لو راجعة عشان تبعدي بيني وبينها استني
دي خدت بالها كويس مني
ولا باعت واستغنت عني مش زيك خالص على فكره
الشخص اللي انتي عرفتيه دلوقتي اتغير
مش ممكن يطلع لحظة صغير في واحده معايا مش بتحير
مش زيك خايف جنبها من بكره
ولا عمري هخون
روحي سيبي روحي لروحي
وضعي معاكي غير الاول
خلاص اللي ده اللي بينا خلاص
ميه وتمانين درجة اتحول
روحي سيبي روحي لروحي
وضعي معاكي غير الاول
خلاص ده اللي بينا خلاص
ميه وتمانين جرجة اتحول
ولا عمري هخووون
الله يسهلك خدي بالك وامشي يا بنتي
انا مكتفي جدا بحبيبتي
مش مممن اكرر تجريبتي
او اي كلام اتقال ليها
انا كنت زمان فاكر بعدنا مش بالساهل
اتاريني كنت زمان جاهل
اتتازل عادي وبتساهل في حقوقي انا ليا كتير فيهاا
ولا عمري هخون
روحي سيبي روحي لروحي
وضي معاكي غير الاول
خلاص ده اللي بينا خلاص
ميه وتمانين درجة اتحول
روحي سيبي روحي لروحي
وضعي معاكي غير الاول
خلاص ده اللي بيتا خلاص
ميه وتمانين درجة اتحول
(end)

english.title: 180 degree
text: if you came to take me away from her wait she took care of me perfectly
she never sell or abandon me. she's not like you by the way
The you knew is changed now. I never be a small one
there is a one with him and he isn't in Aimlessness. beside her he isn't afraid of tomorrow
and I will never betray
Leave let my soul to my soul. my relation to you isn't the same
it's the end about what between us. it has been changed a 180 degree
Leave let my soul to my soul. my relation to you isn't the same
it's the end about what between us. it has been changed a 180 degree
and I will never betray
god bless you go away my girl. I'm very satisfied with my love
I will never repeat my fault or anything said to her

I was easily abandon in many rights to me
and I will never betray
Leave let my soul to my soul. my relation to you isn't the same
it's the end about what between us. it has been changed a 180 degree

it's the end about what between us. it has been changed a 180 degree

english.title: 180 degrees
text: If you've come to separate between me and her, wait ... She has taken good care of me
And she never sold (left me) or abandoned me, not like you at all by the way
The person which you knew has now changed ... He will never for a moment seem/appear little
There is one with him who isn't confusing .. I'm not afraid beside her from tomorrow and never in my life will I betray
Go leave my soul to myself. My situation with you is different to how it was first
Enough, what was between us has changed 180 degrees
Go leave my soul to myself. My situation with you is different to how it was first
Enough, what was between us has changed 180 degrees and I will never betray
God make it easier for you*, take yourself and walk (away) my daughter ** .. I'm content with my lover
It's not possible that I repeat my experience or any words said to me
I used to think before that it was not easy for us to part, it turmed out that I was previously ignorant
It's ok/normal for me to give up and be lenient in my rights which I deserve
Go leave my soul to myself. My situation with you is different to how it was first
Enough, what was between us has changed 180 degrees
Go leave my soul to myself. My situation with you is different to how it was first
Enough, what was between us has changed 180 degrees
* a sort of wish which means he hopes things will turn out good for her
** in this sense 'daughter' is used to belittle her

english.title: With a Word We Make Up
text: With a word we make up and with two we go back
No matter what disapproves we have no other but each other
Distance shows the difference between being rough and tender
And a little bit doesn't show more than our distance
We left and came back to what we had
What will make us leave after all of that, what?
A little bit passes on my heart and makes me calm
And it tells me who has loved you in the way that I do
Why should I leave her to call me and in the distance miss me
I know she needs me and I need her more
We left and came back to what we had
What will make us leave after all of that, what?
We left and came back to what we had
What will make us leave after all of that, what?

text: It gets hard thinking about my self  every time i remember you ..and the tiredness i get after seeing you .. your the reason of it
I loved you more than i loved my self .and discovered i been taking from my self even thought i really wanted that you stay in my point of view for so long
i wish that every one who hears me .feels my heart that hurting me.and never say  its normal and so what. it happens alot

what you really wanted ..should have shown from the start . it shouldn't take so long.. i had to get far  and continue my life  before i saw you
and now i regret it that i didnt hear people talk ..why did i continue ..and based on what..and i feel pain every time i see you

i wish that every one who hears me .feels my heart that hurting me.and never say  its normal and so what. it happens alot

arabic.title: Dayman maak
text: دايما معاك لو فى الخيال
حبيبى واقرب حد مهما الوقت طال
وكأنى حاسس من زمان
فى يوم هنبقى لبعض زى ماقلبى قال
انا بين ايديك
حلم ولا حقيقة وانت قصاد عينيا
احساسى ليك
وازاى معاه وصلت للدرجة ديا
انت الوحيد اللى انا اضحى بعمرى وحياتى
وسنينى وذكرياتى واتمنى اعيش معاه كل الحياة
عارف نفسى توعدنى بأيه
ميبقاش حبيبى بينا وقت للخصام
شف ضاع وباقى قد ايه
اليوم يضيع فى بعادى عنك مش حرام

english.title: Always With You
text: Always with you even in my imagination,
My darling I'm the closest no matter how far away you are,
We will be together forever no matter the distance,
One day, just like my heart says.
I'm between your hands (you have control of me)
Is this a dream or reality when you're in fron of me?
My feelings for you,
Have reached such a high level
You're the only one I would risk my life fore,
All my years, my memories for just to spend the rest of my life with you
You know something, I wish you would promise me,
That there won't be any time for us to fight,
See how much time has passed and how much remains?
In my seperation from you, the day is lost, wasted
Is that fair?

arabic.title: Habibtak
text: ايه يا قلبي جرآك ايه كـل يوم تسألني عليه
فـوق بقى من الي بقيت فيه دا حبيبنا رآح
كل يوم بتسيبو سهران عاش لوحدو ليالي حيران
حد غيرو زمانو كان خاين وسابلك جراح
حــبيبتك خدها غـيرك وانتا بتضيع هواك
حس بيها وخدها منك الي يوم كانت معاك
وياه لو لاقينا البعد بينا سكة رجوع
حــبيبتك خدها غـيرك وانتا بتضيع هواك
حس بيها وخدها منك الي يوم كانت معاك
الي يوم كانت معاك اللي يوم كانت معاك
الي كان طول عمرو في ايديك وانتا سبتو يضيع في اديك
بعدو ليه بقى صعب عليك وناديت عليه
طول غيابك عنو قساه والي حس بقلبو نساه
وغرامك راح من جواه وراحت عليك
حــبيبتك خدها غـيرك وانتا بتضيع هواك
حس بيها وخدها منك الي يوم كانت معاك
وياه لو لاقينا البعد بينا سكة رجوع

حس بيها وخدها منك الي يوم كانت معاك

english.title: Habibtak
text: what happened to you my heart, you're asking me about him (my love)
wake up, our love is gone
you leave her every day awake, he (his love) stayed confused many nights alone
if he was another one, he would betray you and left you wounds (hurt you)
someone else has taken you love and you lost it
he felt her and took her from you, who she was yours one day.
Oh, i wish we can find a way to get back together
someone else has taken you love and you lost it
he felt her and took her from you, who she was yours one day.
she was yours one day
he was in your hands for ages, you lost by your hands
why is it hard for you after he left you, and you're calling for him
your staying away form him, made him indurate, and he forgot what he felt with his heart before.
and your love in him is gone, and you lost her
someone else has taken you love and you lost it
he felt her and took her from you, who she was yours one day.
Oh, i wish we can find a way to get back together
someone else has taken you love and you lost it
he felt her and took her from you, who she was yours one day.

english.title: i'm feeling the fear
text: i'm feeling the fear is making my heart away from yours i don't know why i don't feel anything from you any more and
why i'm being a very weird person while i'm in your arms
i see words in ur eyes that only have one meaning ,it's that the end of everything between us is coming soon
ma3aya bardo ba3ed 3alaya
days and years i kept my soul with you and i didn't have in my heart that you' can be cruel and
you can forget your promises ,it's impossible for me to imagine the days without you even for one second
i see words in ur eyes that only have one meaning ,it's that the end of everything between us is coming soon
ma3aya bardo ba3ed 3alaya

arabic.title: Heya di (Aktar haga) (أكتر حاجة) (هي دي)
text: ياااااااه
يا ليل يا ليل يا ليل يا ليل ياااا ليل
و اااااااه
اكثر حاجة بحبها فيكي هو ده
اااه هو ده
ااااااااه قلبك
و اكثر حاجة شدتني ليكي هي دي
اااه هي دي
طيييبة قلبك
واكثر حاجة بتموتني و توديني كده وتجبني
لما اديا بتيجي عليكي وعنيكي فعنيه
واجمل حاجه وحلى ما فيكي
شفايفك همسك كل ما فيكي
عليكي مشية الله يخليكي بالراحة علييه
ياااه على الاياااام لما الايام تضحك للواحد مرة واحدة
و اااه يا سلام يا سلام
هقولك كلام انا عمري ما قلتو لاي واحدة
ياااه يا ليل يا ليل يا ليل يا ليل يااا ليل
و اااه
انا عارف اني الملايكة يا حبيبتي
يا حبيبتي ما بتتشفش
و ازاي انا شايفك
واحلى ما فحبي ليكي انو اتاخد افش
ااه عشان ما بخفش
معقول انا شايفك
واكثر حاجة بتموتني و توديني كده وتجيبني
ااه ااااه
وعنيكي فعنيه
واجمل حاجة واحلى ما فيكي
شفايفك همسك كل ما فيكي
ااه اااه بالراحة علييه
واكثر حاجة بحبها فيكي هو ده اااه هو ده
اااه قلبك
اااااه هي دي
طيبة قلبك

english.title: That's Her
text: Ohh.. oh night, oh night
The thing I love about you most is your heart
The thing that has drawn me to you most, yes, it is your kind heart
And the thing that kills me most and sends me away and brings me back
When my hands touch you and your eyes are glancing into mine
And the most beautiful thing about you is your lips, I will hold everything of you
I'm drawn to you, May God keep you, take it easy on me
Oh wow for the days when they laugh for someone all at once
And oh wow oh wow I've said things to you that I've never said to another
Ohhh, oh night, oh night
I know my darling that the angels do not see you the way I see you
And the best thing is that my love for you came in bundles, this is why I am not afraid
Is it possible I'm seeing you

english.title: Heya de (Aktar 7aga)
text: oooh..ya lel ya leel
the thing i like in you the most is this..is this heart of yours
and the thing in you that attracted me the most is this...is this the goodness of your heart
and the thing that kills me and melts me,and brings me like that the most
when my hands touche you and your eyes are in mine
and the most beautiful thing and the sweetest are your lips, your whispering ,everything in you
what a walk you have ,please go easy on me
oh ,the days ,when the days smile to someone once
and ah ,ya salam ya salam* what a speech!! i've never said that to a girl
baby i know that angels can't be seen so how come i can see you?
ma32ola ana shayfk

arabic.title: Kammel Lewahdak (كمل لوحدك)
text: ولا هصدق حاجه تقولهالى مهما تعيد وتزيد
مين اللى يضمنلى انى ماندمنش مره تانى كمان
ولا هعلق روحى معاك من تانى بحلم جديد
ماهو اللى كان عنده حاجه يعملها كان عملها زمان
كمل لوحدك وافتكرنى بخير يلا ماتقولش هانت قولتهالى كتير ولله
في حاجات تبان اخرتها من الاول وانا هغير رائي بجد وصلت لاخرى معاك
تعبت بزياده مش هتلاقينى تانى مهما يكون
وليه حياتى الجايه هعيشها عشان بس استناك
مين اللى يستنى حاجه مش جايه الا لو مجنون
كمل لوحدك وافتكرنى بخير يلا ماتقولش هانت قولتهالى كتير ولله
في حاجات تبان اخرتها من الاول وانا هغير رائى بجد وصلت لاخرى معاك

english.title: Go alone
text: I will not believe whatever you tell me no matter what you do,
Who will ensure me that I will not be regretful again?
I will not give my soul to a new dream of you,
Before it had a goal, but now there's nothing for it to do,
Go (complete the story) by yourself and remember me as a good person hurry up,
Don't say it will be easy you told it many times,
The commence of some stories shows the end,
I will not change my decision and I can not keep up with you at all,
I exhausted many times i will not be again no matter what happens,
Why should i spend my future waiting for you?
Who will wait for the thing which never comes except a mad?!

arabic.title: khalina ekhwat
text: قَلي خلينا اصحاب قَلي خلينا اخوات
واسأل عليك وتسأل عليا
قلت دا مجنون ولا ايه
مش عارف هوا عندي ايه
علشان يقول الكلمة ديه وعينه بعنيا
معقولة اللي انا كنت بحسه معاه كنت بحسه انا بس
بحسه بس
معقول حبي كان طرف واحد
كنت انا اللي بحبه بس
بحبه بس
سامحني أنا فعلاً مش حاقدر أكون، أكون قدامك وما حبكش
انا دلوقتي بحبك أكثر يا ريتني أصلاً ما اعرفتكش
أنا تعبان موجوع من بعدك
أنا صعبان على نفسي بجد
هو انا ينفع أعيش من بعدك
وما في أصلاً بعدك حد
أنا حابعد حتى أحاول أنسى
أو أمثل على نفسي نسيت
بالحالتين أنا بعت خلاص
لو فعلاً سبتني ومشيت
أنا بكرهك يا قلبي أنا بكرهك
ما بتروحش ليه غير للي بجرحك
بكرهك يا قلبي أنا بكرهك
ما بتروحش ليه غير للي بجرحك
بكرهك يا قلبي أنا بكرهك
ما بتروحش غير للي بجرحك

english.title: Stay siblings
text: Said lets stay friends, let's stay siblings. You ask for me and I'll ask for you. I said is she crazy or what. she doesn't know what she means to me so she can say this while looking into my eyes. Is it possible everything I've been feeling am the only one whose feeling.
Is it possible that it's love from one side. I'm I the only one who loved.
Forgive me but I can't be here infront of you and not love you.
Now I love you more and I wish I never met you.
I'm tired and hurt because of you
I'm mad at myself.
Can I live without you ?
And there's no one after you.
I'll walk away and try to forget
Or act and lie to myself that I did.
I hate you heart I hate you
Why do you go to people who hurt you
I hate you heart I hate you
Why do you go to people who hurt you
I hate you hear I hate you
You go to the people who hurt you

arabic.title: Koll Elly Fat
text: Kol eli fat mn 3omri 3adda k2eno sa3at awel ma shoft 3ainaik
ya 7abibi ahh ha3eesh ma3ak toul el 7aya bas ha3sha2 fik
eli zayak enta yetshaal 3al rass w ma ynzlshi
dali zayak enta yo2mor w kalamou kolo yemshi
how ana 3aref anam mn yom ma 3reftak ya 7abibi
argouk sahran msh la2i kalam yewseflak ta3zibi
ha2olha w khalas ba3sha2 3ainih w b7bo ya nass mahma ya3mal feya
w mn el layla di habda2 7ayati lel la7za di w eedak fi eedaya

english.title: Koll Elly Fat
text: All the years that have passed in my life felt like hours the first time I saw your eyes
Baby, I am gonna be with you all my life so long as I get to love you
A woman like you should be put on a pedestal and not come down
A woman like you should give orders and every single order be fulfilled
I have been unable to sleep since I've met you, baby
I apologize, I haven't slept so it's hard to find words to describe the torture
I'll tell her like this, I love her eyes and I love her regardless of what she does to me
And from this night on, my life will start the moment her hands are in mine

we ansa el kalam el ana ailo

english.title: I still love you
text: I still love you
I still feel you
I need you and my soul embraces you
But my heart has a grudge against you
It can't forgive you
Whenever I come to make good with you
I find my intention is to hurt you
My darling
My soul tells you
My soul complains to you about that which tired me of you
I said I'll leave but I can't leave
My soul is at ease in the embrace of your eyes

arabic.title: Ma Ye7remneesh Mennak (ما يحرمنيش منك)
text: حبيبي وانا جنبك ... تعرف بحس بإيه
وأنا في حضن قلبك ... ببقى عايز اقولك أيه
يامحلى الدنيا وأنا جنبك ... يا كل منايا محتجلك
حبيبي ياعمري ماتسيبنيش ... وحيات اغلى حاجه عندك
ومايحرمنيش منك ... ومايبعدنيش عنك
حبيبي النهارده لازم تعرف ... حبك عاملي جنان
انا بحبك بحبك حب ماحبوش إنسان ... آه ياحبيبي
ومايحرمنيش منك ... وما يبعدنيش عنك
يامحلى الدنيا وأنا جنبك ... ياكل منايا محتجلك
حبيبي ياعمري ماتسيبنيش ... وحيات اغلى جاحه عندك

english.title: I Wish God Won't Deprive Me from You
text: y love, when I'm by your side
do you know what I feel?
when I'm in the arms of your heart
what do I want to tell you?
oh how beautiful the world is when I'm by your side
oh you everything I have, I need you
my love, my life, don't leave me
swear by the most precious thing for you
and I wish god won't deprive me from you
and I wish he won't separate me from you
my love, today you must know
that your love drives me insane
I love you..I love you
a love that no human has ever loved
and ohhhhhhhh my love
swear by the most precious thing for you
and I wish god won't deprive me from you
and I wish he won't separate me from you
oh how beautiful the world is when I'm by your side
oh you everything I have, I need you
my love, my life, don't leave me
swear by the most precious thing for you

text: la la la matwsnesh 3ala 7obby leek
hwa ana ba3rf a7´od karar 2odam 3enek ?

hwa ana 3omry 3ereft arta7 3´er mn eidek

la la la ana melk hawak

enta elly tegy f el 3omr mara wla tetnsesh

english.title: No Need to Make Me Watch Over
text: No, no, no need to make my watch over my love for you
Can I make a decision in front of those eyes?
No no no I can not live unless it's around you
Have I ever known comfort other than in your arms?
No no no I won't forget you
No no no I am the property of your love
No no no I lived with you the best days of my life
No need to make me watch over my love for you
I will only live for you
I swear by your eyes rest assured that I am sure I am going back to you
No no no so forget what or what?
What in you can be forgotten, my dear?
No no no is it possible that you don't know what you are
You are the one in a million that can't be forgotten
No need to make me watch over my love for you.. I am only yours
I swear by your eyes rest assured that I am sure I am going back to you
No no no I won't forget you.. no no no I am a product of your love
No no no I lived with you the best days of my life
No need to make me watch over my love for you.. I am only yours
I swear by your eyes rest assured that I am sure I am going back to you

arabic.title: Rou7 2alby
text: روح قلبى انا وعدتك وصدقنى هكون وياك
وعليك ابيع روحى ما انا روحى ياعمرى فداك
خليك هنا معايا ياروح قلبى متوحشنيش
خليك قصاد عينى عشان قلبى مايوجعنيش
تعالى نعيش حبيبى حياتنا
سيبك ماللى عدى وفاتنا
ايه فى الدنيا دى هيحوشنا
ماهو انت انا
طب خلى الدنيا تضايقك يوم
وشوف انا هعمل ايه فى الدنيا
علشانك انا اتحدى الكون
ولا اشوف دموعك لو ثانية
مش قادر انسى اول مرة شوفتك عملت ايه
ده انا بوست ايديا علشان سلمت عليك
وساعتها مابنش عليا ان عنيا بتموت فيك
وحاولت ادارى بس ضعفت قدام عنيك
تعالى نعيش حبيبى حياتنا
سيبك ماللى عدى وفاتنا
ايه فى الدنيا دى هيحوشنا
ماهو انت انا
طب خلى الدنيا تضايقك يوم
وشوف انا هعمل ايه فى الدنيا
علشانك انا اتحدى الكون
ولا اشوف دموعك لو ثانية

english.title: THE SOUL OF MY HEART
text: the soul off my heart i promise you belive me i will be with you
for you i will sold my heart your worth my soul baby
stay here with me my soul heart don't make me miss you
stay infront off my eyes so my heart wont hurt me
come baby let live our lifes leave what gone what going to happen iam you
tha letthe world bother you a little and look what iam going to do tothe world
for you i dare the world so i wont see you tears for second
i can't forget the first time i saw what did i do
i kissed my hands beacues the check your hands
that time my eyes couldn't sleep beacues there are diying for you
i tried to control but i was weak infront of you eyes

english.title: My Heart's Soul
text: My heart's soul I have promised you and believe me I will stay with you
And for you I would sell my soul, my dear
Stay here with me, my heart's soul, don't make me miss you
Come let us live our lives baby
Forget about the past.. what in this world will protect us
You and I are one
So let the world upset you once.. and see what I will do to this world
For you I will challenge the world just so I don't see your tears for even a second

english.title: Rou7 2alby
text: My heart’s soul ,I promised you and believe me I’ll be always with you
And for you I’ll sell my soul ,my soul is ransom for you darling
Stay here with me my heart’s soul ,don’t let me miss you
Stay infront of my eyes so that my heart will not hurted
Come darling to live our life
And forget what had been passed
What will remain in this life
You are me
Let the world bother you alittle
Then look what I will do for the world
I will challenge all the universe
so that not to see your tears even for seconds
I cannot forget when I saw you for the first time what I did
I kissed my hands (means : I thanked the God so much) because I greeted you
But at that time it didn’t appear on my face that my eyes dying for you
And I tried to control ,but I was weak infront of your eyes
Come darling to live our life
And forget what had been passed
What will remain in this life
You are me
Let the world bother you alittle
Then look what I will do for the world
I will challenge all the universe
so that not to see your tears even for seconds

text: you left the love..forgot about it.. you better keep forgetting
dont play with my heart /dont laugh at my heart.. and dont hurt my feelings
miss what ? you mister missing !! calm down and wake up !
I came to you by peace and yoou welcome me by war.. now you'll taste my suffer
now the love is far away from my heart.. get out of my head
what brought you back ? you think I still live the past ?!
plz. dont waste my time cause I dont have anytime for you
same as the first part
If I were you I wouldnt be stubborn

arabic.title: Ya ta3beny
text: 3omraha 7asaletlk de .. teb2a lesa shayef 7ad
w lesa mate3rfoush .. aywa mate3rfoush
bss nfsk tegry 3aleh .. to7dono w tenam f 3eneh
aywa mat3rfoush
ana ba2a 7aset da m3ak .. ana ba2a talbany hawak
ana ba2a mn youm mashoftk .. msh motkhayel gher 3omry m3ak

(he means hurt in a good way.. basically she has the "WOW" factor)
mn 7obby msh 2ader a7´abby
ha2olk 3ala elly f 2alby .. besara7a ana msh 3ala ba3dy
3ayzk te7dony te2arab menny .. wla a7don ana
matestghrbsh mn elly ana 2olto .. ana galy e7sas lek fa2olto
da el 7ozn f 2alby enta shelto .. awel mashoftk ana
tab ana ba2a 7aset da m3ak .. ana ba2a talbany hawak
ana ba2a mn youm mashoftk .. msh motkhayel gher 3omry m3ak
ya ta3beny .. ya wage3 2alby
mn 7obby msh 2ader a7´abby

english.title: You tire me out
text: Have it ever happened to you?
once you've seen someone and you haven't known him yet
Yes you don't know him
But you wish you run to him
hug him and sleep in his eyes
and you haven't known him yet
Yes you don't know him
I've felt this with you
I desire your love badly
Since the day I've seen you
I can't imagine my life without you
You tire me out, you hurt my heart
I can't hide my love
I'll tell you what inside my heart
Honestly, I can't stand
I want you to hug me and to come close to me
Otherwise I'll hug you
Don't get astonished from what I've said
I felt this feeling so I've said it
You removed the sorrow from my heart once I've seen you
I've felt this with you
I desire your love badly
Since the day I've seen you
I can't imagine my life without you

english.title: You, Who's Tired Me
text: This has never happened to you.. must mean you are still seeing someone
And you still don't know him.. yes, you don't know him
But I wish you would run to him.. hug him and sleep in his eyes
Yes, you don't know him
I feel that way about you.. your love is calling to me
From the day I first saw you.. I could only picture life with you
You, who's tired me.. hurt my heart
I can't hide from my love
I'll tell you what's in my heart.. and seriously I haven't been myself
I want you to hug me and come closer.. or I'll hug you
Don't be confused from what I said.. I have feelings for you so I told you
When I first saw you, you had removed the sadness in my heart
I feel that way about you.. your love is calling to me
From the day I first saw you.. I could only picture life with you
You, who's tired me.. hurt my heart
I can't hide from my love

arabic.title: أبدأ بنفسك
text: إبدا بنفسك إغلب شطانك ونفسك الاماره بالسوء
إبدا بنفسك إغلب شيطانك لا الدنيا تاخدك إلحق فوق
مش هبص لرزق غيري وهحمد ربنا علي كرمه
......اللي يشوف الام الناس بجد يهون عليه المه
وهحافظ علي لساني ومفيش كلام علي حد مش موجود
مش إحترام إني في ضهر حد اتكلم عشان مش هقدر لو موجوده
واتعلم إزاي اتكلم واتناقش رغم الاختلاف
واسمع راي غيري واحترمه ولا يوصل اختلافنا خلاف
هسمع كلام ابويا وامي انا لازم اكسب رضاهم
وابعد عن اللي هيدمرني وارجع في حضنهم معاهم
مش هبص لبنت ماشيه واضايقها بأي كلام وخلاص
عشان اللى مرضاهوش علي بيتي مرضاهوش علي بنات الناس
لازم اعرف اختار صحابي ويكون لي حلم عشانه بعيش
محتاج انا كل دقيقه بتضيع علي ناس متلزمنيش
والاقوي اللى يبدا يصالح حتي لو كان مش غلطان
عشان غلب شيطانه وسامح نفذ اوامر الرحمن
وعيوب كتير فينا فيها اللى يتقال واللى ميتقالش
يارب قدرنا نبعد بعيد عنا نلحق حياتنا منندمش

english.title: Start by yourself
text: Start by yourself, beat your evil and your bad soul
Start by yourself, beat your evil, before your life'll be ended, wake up!
I won't look at others' graces, and and I'll thank god for his graces.
knowing people's issues, lettin' you feel your issues are so petty.
I'll keep an eye on my tongue, and won't gossip on someone ain't here.
it's disrespect, when I talk about someone in his behind, because I can't do this in his presence.
and I'll learn how to talk and discuss inspite of the difference.
and listen to other's point of view and respect it, our difference won't lead us to fight.
I'll obey dad and mom, I gotta get their satisfactions.
and leave who loses me and back to their lap.
I won't stair at any girl walkin' and won't harass her by any speech.
because what I don't wish to happen to my people, I shouldn't wish the same to other people.
Gotta know how to pick up my friends, and have a dream to live for.
need every moment which loses for unwanted poeple.
and the strongest starts to make up even if he's not guilty.
'cause he've beated his evil and forgived, excuted god's demands.
many cons we have, some of them can be told, and other can't.
may God help us to go away from 'em, rescue our life, and    to never regret.

arabic.title: أصعب إحساس
text: اصعب احساس في الدنيا
لما تحس بظلم وخوف
وانت يا عيني وحيد في الدنيا
ملكش حد ملكش ضهر
ويوم ما تيجي تتكلم
ما حدش يسمعك
ويوم ما تنوي تتقدم
تلاقي كله بيرجعك
ويوم ما تلاقي حبيبي ترتحلو
هوا اول واحد يخدعك
وعشان انا عادي وابويه كان عادي
يبقى حلال فينا الذل والعزاب
انا والي زيي ما لوش حد يحس بيه
غير ربنا يجبله حقه من اي حد

english.title: The Hardest Feeling
text: The hardest feeling in the world
When you feel guilt and hate and you are all alone
In this world, you have nobody..
And the day you come to speak.. no one hears
And the day that passes brightly.. you find that everyone refuses you
And the day you find alover you're comfortable with.. she is the first one
She is the first one.. the first one to trick you
And because I am normal and my dad was normal (normal = plain and simple)
Then it was a condition in us the guilt and torture
Me and others like me have no one but God that knows our pain
Only He can get our rights from anyone.. and make our hearts happy
And the day you find alover you're comfortable with.. she is the first one
She is the first one.. the first one to trick you
Why? Why? Why?

arabic.title: أطمن
text: الناس شايفينك بطريقة وانا لوحدى شايفك بطريقة..
دايما عايزين منك حاجة وكله بيتعامل بسذاجة..
شايفنيك كد من براكى ومحدش شاف ايه جواكى..
بتحسي بايه وانتى لوحدك واللى بتحلمى بيه وفى نفسك..
مين الانسان اللى لحد دلوقتى مهزش مرة عواطفك..
دايبين فى عنيكى و لون شعرك ومحدش بيراعى مشاعرك..
اللى انت حبيبى بتقوله جوايا وكان نفسى تقوله..
انا نفسى فى حياتى محدش غيرك يسكن عمرى بطوله..
انا روحى اتخلقت علشانك ومكانى فى الدنيا مكانك..
بصراحة هموت انا على اليوم ده..
اللى هكون انا فى حضنك ياه يا حبيبى..
شايف فى عينى ضعفى وشوقى و كل حنينى ..
قدامك يا ابو احلى عيون ياللى علشان عمرى يهون..
و يوم ورا يوم حبك بيزيد كل يوم وعشانك مبدوقش النوم .. و عشانك ما بدوقش النوم..
خليك بين ايدى متسبنيش لحظة يا حبيبى انا هلغى حياتى ومواعيدى ..انا هلغى حياتى ومواعيدى..
اطمن ايوة اطمن ناوية انا اكمل عمرى معاك..
والليلة ايوة الليلة هبدا عمرى الجاى فى هواك..
مطمن انا مطمن مين فى الدنيا يبقى معاك..
ويكون كده مش مطمن..
ده انا يا حبيبى عايش لهواك..
واخيرا ولأول مرة انسان مش شايفك من بره..
انسان حس بقلبك قبل ما عينه تشوفك يا ملاك..
آآآه بحبك .. آآآه بحبك
انا هلغي حياتي و مواعيدي .. انا هلغي حياتي و مواعيدي..
يوم ورا يوم حبك بيزيد كل يوم وعشانك مبدوقش النوم .. و عشانك ما بدوقش النوم..
اطمن ايوة اطمن ناوية انا اكمل عمرى معاك..
من الليلة ايوة الليلة هبدا عمرى الجاى انا فى هواك..
مطمن انا مطمن مين فى الدنيا يبقا معاك..
ويكون كده مش مطمن ده انا يا حبيبى عايش لهواك..
الرجوع الى أعلى الصفحة اذهب الى الأسفل

english.title: Day after day
text: Day after day

People see you in one way and I, alone, see you in another way. They always want something from you and everyone treats you with naivety. They only see you from the outside and no one saw what's inside. What do you feel when you're alone and what do you dream about and wish for? Who is the only person that until now hasn't hurt you feeling? People are obsessed with your eyes and haircolor but no one cares for your feelings.

Baby, what you are saying is inside of me and I've been hoping you would say it. I wish for a life in which no one but you lives in it with me. My soul was created for you and my place in this world is yours... To tell you the truth I'll die for this day that I will be in your lap, Oh baby, you see in my eyes my weaknesses and my longings and all of my cravings in front of you, Oh man with the most beautiful eyes, who for you my life plays..

Day after day, your love increases every day, and because of you I don't taste sleep, and because of you I don't taste sleep... Stay in my hands, don't ever leave me baby, I'll cancel my life and appointments, I'll cancel my life and appointments... Don't worry, yes don't worry, I'm willing to finish my life with you... From this night, yes this night, I'll begin my coming life with you...

Finally, and for the same time someone hasn't seen you from the outside, someone has felt you heart before his eyes have seen you oh angel... OOh I love you... Oooh I love you.. I'll cancel my life and appointments, I'll cancel my life and appointments... Day after day, your love increases... and because of you... and because of you I don't taste sleep... Don't worry, yes don't worry, I'm willing to finish my life with you... From this night, yes this night, I'll begin my coming life with you... I'm not worrying who in this world can be with you and worries, baby I live for you....

it's ok, I've lived alone before you

the looks of pity, and that doesn't look good on you

it's its right to be in pain

anything that leaves a scar
you know, if I'm dying, I'll say I'm living happily
it's easier for me to die, than for you to see me weakened

arabic.title: أنا خايف

ويعيش العمر جمبى ولنفسى يحبني
انا خايف اموت وحيد من غير مالاقى حبيب
احساس الحب عمري ماحسش قلبى بيه
انا خايف يجي حد معرفش احبه بجد
و ان جالي و قال بحبك مش عارف اقوله ايه
ياقلبى هنعمل ايه في اللى احنا وصلنا ليه
دا العمر فات وعدى ولسة لوحدنا
بنقابل ناس كتير ونلاقي في تغيير
وفي كل مره نرجع انا وانت لوحدنا

english.title: I'm an Egyptian
text: Even if I went around the world
With all the longing of my eyes and heart
I always come back to this country
It has everything that comes from the heart
It's people are real men, they are a rare coin in any place
Anyone should be honoured to be an Egyptian
And that is not an exaggeration!
I'm an egyptian, that holds his country over his head
I would sacrifice my life for it, and any hard thing would become easy
There's no one like me, Egypt's Nile is in my blood
It's letters are a light on my name
It's the most precious thing in the universe
If you asked, "What does egyptian mean?"
I'd tell you it means "Heart, Soul and Principle"
We've always been good people
And we start by greeting you with "Peace"
Whether you're muslim or christian
We're all brothers with the same rights
Whatever happens between us
Our history is all the same
I'm an egyptian, that holds his country over his head
I would sacrifice my life for it, and any hard thing would become easy
There's no one like me, Egypt's Nile is in my blood
It's letters are a light on my name
It's the most precious thing in the universe

arabic.title: أيام زمان
text: بيخدنا حنين
ويجبنا حنين

ناس نبقابل ناس
ونفارق ناس
ومش قادرين ننسى اللى كان

محلمش فى يوم
لو ترجع بيه ايام زمان
على زكرى ساعات

english.title: The Past Days
text: Tenderness takes me and tenderness brings me back
Days pass and everyday we see so much
As time passes there are things we forget
And things in our hearts we remember completely
New people we meet and people we lose touch with
And we can't forget what was
Who on Earth who has not dreamt of a day
If he could go back to the past days
On a memory made in an hour from our lives long ago
We live wishing for a day from our life that had passed
And to live with people who were the most precious of people
And if only we can go back to those most beautiful memories

arabic.title: إرتاح
text: ارتاح اللى انت عايزه اتعملك
وبعدت ورضيت بحلك
ماتلومش حد الا نفسك بتلومنى ليه
وارتاح واهو كل واحد فى حاله
والبعد مين اللى قاله
مش قولت نبعد بنفسك قولت ورضيت بيه
مين اللى كان غلطان واهو تايه وعاش حيران
مين اللى راجع متأخر وعايزنى ارضى عليه
وانا سهل اوى مرضاش وافضل عنك بعيد مصفاش
ادينى وقت وانا هفكر ونشوف هنعمل ايه
ااااه ندمان وراجعلى تحلف بعمرك
مانا كنت ليك تحت امرك
وماشوفتش حاجة منى غير الاخلاص
تعبان ماللى انت عملته فيا محتاج افكر شوية
مابقتش عارف بحبك ولا خلاص

arabic.title: إطلع من دول
text: ليه قولي ليه ... قلبي حب ورق ليه
وانت قلبك ليه ما دق ... قولي ليه
سؤال و جاوبني عليه ... حد يقول للحب لأ
وإحنا الحب علينا حق ... قولي ليه
إطلع من دول ... مانتش من دول .. وأنا مش من دول ... يالي شاغلني
مانا لسه بقول ... ما هو مش معقول ... هفضل مشغول... وإنت شاغلني
وتقولي ملكش في كده ... وطلعت إنت أبو كده
ترميني في نار .. و تسبني أحتار .. وعايزني أفضل على كده
مين قوللي مين .. عارف كان هيحب مين .. ولا كان هايقبله فين ..قولي مين
حوالينا الناس فاهمين .. إن أنا وإنت متفاهمين .. وإنت بتعمل دول ...على مين

arabic.title: إعتذرى

خدت كل حاجه فى عهدى وشوفى عهدى كان كام سنه

arabic.title: اسكتى
text: اسكتى مش الحياه من غيرك طلعت أحلى
وانا كنت فاكرها فى بعدك هتكون صعبه ومش سهله
واه كان بينا كلمه ووعد بس احنا نصيبنا مش لبعض
انتى فى حالك وانا فى حالى .. وممكن كده نسأل على بعض
ورايحه تقولى كلام للناس .. على اى اساس بتقولى جرحنى وعمره ما حس
انتى اللى متتحبيش فى حياتك غير ديما غير حاجه واحده بس
ياريت اقدر اقولها فى اغنيه
العيب مش فيكى ده أنا اللى بميل لناس متعرفش الحنيه .. وقلوبها كده فتحاها سبيل
ياريت ارجع للى انا حبيتها .. إزاى عرفتك بعدها
معاكى بس عرفت قيمتها .. ولا يسوى حبك ضلها

text: Be quiet, you know that life without you is actually much better

arabic.title: اطمني
text: جنبك حبيبتى مهما تعبتنى الظروف
هشيلك جوه عينى معايا تنسى اى خوف
ومن الساعه دى يا عمرى الى تؤمرية
فى ثوانى هتلاقية
و وعد منى تنسى الايام الجارحه
ولا هسمح يوم اشوف فى عنيك غير
دموع فرحه
وجودى لو مش حميكى
يبقى ماستهلش اعيش
يا حبيبتى متخفيش
و اوعى جنبى فى يوم تخافى
وارمى حملك فوق كتافى
حتى لو هيهدنى اطمنى
طول ما انتى موجودة قصادى
مهما اشوف من الدنيا عادى
برضو مش هيهزنى اطمنى
شوفتك عرفت بجد معنى الدنيا ايه
غريب من يومها وانتى
كل حلم بتبقى فيه
ومن النهارده هتبقى عمرى ودنيتى
وحبيتبى وصحبتى
حبيبتى اليوم ده فعلا فارق فى حياتى
ومن حبى فيه هعتبره ده يوم ميلادى
انا مش مصدق عينى انى وصلت ليكى
ربنا يخليكى ربنا يخليكى

english.title: Ease off
text: By your side darling, no matter how much conditions get me tired
I'll carry you in my eyes. With me you forget any fear
And from this hour, my love, whatever you order
In seconds you'll find it
And a promise from me you'll forget the hurtful days
And I won't let a day seeing in your eyes but
the tears of joy
My being, if it didn't protect you
then I don't deserve to live
My love don't be afraid
And don't you a day, when you're next to me, be afraid
And throw your weights on my shoulders
Even if it would destroy me, ease off*
As long as you are in front of me*
Whatever I see from life, It's OK
It, too, won't shake me, ease off*
Seeing you, I knew what the meaning of life is
It's weird since that day and you
in each dream you stay inside it
And from today you'll be my years, my life
my love, and my friend
My love today is really distinct in my life
And from my love to this day, I'll consider it my birthday
I don't believe my eyes that I reached you
May the lord preserve you, May the lord preserve you*

arabic.title: اكلمها
text: أكلمها مابتردتش عشان أقلق
وبعد شوية أكلمها وانا مبرق
وناوي اديها كام كلمه يدايقوها
ترد عليا قال نايمة دي قال نايمة وبتفوق
الم واهدى نبضاتى اللى بتخبط
واقول بينى وبين نفسى بتستعبط
عشان الوقت دا مش وقت نوم خالص
فقلت لازم اخلي دماغها اخلى دماغها تتظبط
وبسكت سكته فاهماها فتتاوب
وتسألنى انت فين اشغلها ولا اجاوب
يفوق صوتها تقولى سؤالي ماسمعتوش
اقول انا عند واحد صاحبى ماتعرفيهوش
ويلا نامى خدى راحتك تقولى صحيت
تجيلى ضحكة اكتمها وانا ف البيت
وانا والله نفسى بجد اطمنها
لكن هى اللى بتخلينى اجننها
بتخلينى اجننها
وكم مرة اكلمها الرقم مشغول
وبستنى تلكمني انتظاري يطول
وبعد ما فعلا اضايق تكلمني
ساعتها موبايلي بيغيظها بيغيظها عشان مقفول
يبان عندي اتصلت كتير ورا بعض
وانا من الضحك والفرحة بكون ع الارض
تجيلي رسالة كلمني عشان ما قفش
اطنشها عشان فعلا عشان فعلا ما بتهددش
تجيلي رسالة انا خارجة وهتأخر
ما صدقتهاش عشان الوقت متأخر
شوية تقولي كلمني عشان عايزاك
ولو طنشت هتأكد فيه واحدة معاك
وبرضو عشان تدايقني تبعتلي سلام
انا في البيت لكن هقفل موبايلي وانام
وانا والله نفسي بجد اطمنها
لكن هي اللي بتخليني اجننها
بتخليني اجننها

english.title: I Call Her
text: I call her and she doesn't answer so that I'll worry
And after I while, I call her and I’m very mad
And I intend to say a few words to annoy her
She answers me saying she was sleeping and just woke up
I collect myself and relax my pounding heart
And I say to myself, "she is pretending not to know"
Because now is not the time to sleep at all
And I thought, "I have to give her time to get her head on straight"
So I get quiet and she understands it and yawns
She asks me where I am and I don't answer to worry her
Her voice rises and she asks, "did you not hear my question?"
I say, "I'm at a friend's, you don't know him,
Go back to sleep and relax." She says, "I'm up."
I suppress a laugh because I am at home
And I really want to reassure her
But she is the one that leads me to make her crazy
She makes me make her crazy
And how many times I try to call her but her line is busy
And I wait for her to call me but I wait a long time
And after I get mad she calls me
At that time my phone makes her mad because it’s off
It shows on my phone that she called many times in a row
And I am on the floor laughing from happiness
I get a message that says, “call me so I don’t get mad”
I ignore it because I really, really, won’t be threatened
I get a message saying “I’m going out and will be late”
I don’t believe it because it’s late
A little later she says, “call me because I want to talk to you,
And if you ignore me then I’ll be sure there is a girl with you”
And also to make me mad she sends a “goodbye”
I’m at home but I turn off my phone and go to sleep
And I really want to reassure her
But she is the one that leads me to make her crazy
She makes me make her crazy

arabic.title: الجنة في بيوتنا
text: تيجي نود بعض تيجوا نسال على بعض ايدى فى ايدك يا ابويا
وهات امى وجدى واخويا نسال على عم محمد وكمان على خالى سعد
مش عاوزين نستنى الدنيا تخدنا بندور على الجنه والجنة فى بيوتنا
تيجو ندعى ونقول الله الله يجمعنا كلنا ولما حد يقول الاه اله توجعنا كبنا
ايدى فى ايدك يا ابويا وهات امى وجدى واخويا نسال
على عم محمد وكمان على خالى سعد
تجوا نود بعض

arabic.title: الحارس الله
text: الحارس الله عليك ايه ده ماشالله
م القريب والغريب واللي ما اتسماش
واللي شافك جنبي وماسماش
ع الحب اللي جمعنا
الحارس الله عليك ايه ده ماشالله
من اللي جاي واللي راح واللي عينه عليك
اتداري يلّا ف حضني بروحي افديك
ايه تاني هيمنعنا!
يلا يلا يومنا النهاردة ووعد مني كل يوم من ده
و آدى عمري لو بس ترضى جاي بكره حب كبير
وخطوة خطوة نبني حكايتنا وانت جنبي هنعيش حياتنا
واللي عدى و م العمر فاتنا هنعيش بداله كتير
دانا قلبي أمّا لقاك فتح الباب ويّا الشباك
معذور ماهو ياما استناك لسنين وسنين
احساس متشال وطلع لعيونك في الحال
م الليلة كده ارتاح البال هفرحلي يومين
افرح انا معاك وعنيا الاتنين حارساك
وايديا هتفضل حضناك لو هتروح فين
في كلام يتقال وكلام مش عايز استعجال
سبحانه اللي خلق ده جمال وخلانا حبيبين

english.title: Allah is the gaurdian
text: May Allah guard you, what is this! mashallah
from the relatives and the strangers and the unknown
and the one who some you next to me and didn't mention the name of allah 1
for the love that brough us together
May allah guard you, what is this! mashallah
from whose coming and who has left and who has his eyes on you
come on, hide in my embrace, I'd sacrifice my soul for you
what else can stop us!
come on come on today is our day and I promise it will be like this everyday
i'd give my life if you accept tomorrow lots of love will come
and step by step we'll build our story while you're next to me we will live our lives
and what has passed and had been lost from our lives we'll love a lot instead of it
when my heart saw you it opened it's door along with the window
it's forgiven for it has waited for you for years and years
a feeling that's been stored and for your eyes it rose immediately
starting tonight my mind will rest, I will be happy for a couple of days
be happy for I am with you and my two eyes are guarding you
and my arms will always embrace you wherever you go
there are words to be said and words that don't need to be rushed
Subhanallah for he has created this beauty and made us lovers

arabic.title: العقدة اتفكت
text: بقى تبقى كل دا هنا جمبى
وعينيا قالبه الدنيا عليك
يا واخدى من روحى دا قبلى
راح منى فاجاءه سخن فى عينيه
اول ما قلبى عليك نادى دوبت زياده
وهادوب تانى
الله ما يقطعلك عاده وتعيش
وتفضل علشانى
دا جمالك الله يزيده
العقده اتفكت على ايده
واليوم الى قاد فيه قلبى اهاا
بقى يوم عيده
ومعاك بقى احلى هدايا
ولا هحلم غير وانتا معايا
من قلبى بحبك وكلااامى اهااا
من جواايا
دا جمالك الله يزيده
العقده اتفكت على ايده
واليوم الى قاد فيه قلبى اهاا
بقى يوم عيده
ومعاك بقى احلى هدايا
ولا هحلم غير وانتا معايا
من قلبى بحبك وكلااامى اهااا
من جواايا
ولا كان لى حظ فى يوم قبلك
ولا عمرى قلبى لغيرك مال
معقوله تسالنى بحبك
بالزمه يعنى دى عايزه سؤاال

english.title: The Knot got Untied
text: So you were here all along next to me?
My eyes has turned the world(upside down)(looking for you)
Oh you one who took me by my soul, (know) that my heart,
Has gone away from me suddenly, and went and lived in your eyes
First when my heart called for you, I melted more(in your love)
And I will melt some more
I hope that God doesn't change the habit(of you loving me) and you live,
And live  for me alone
Your beauty, may God enhance it,
The knot got untied because of it
And the day where my heart my met you, ah,
Became its birthday
With you comes the best gifts
And I will never dream unless you're with me
I love you, and my words come(straight), ah,
From (deep) inside of me
Your beauty, may God enhance it,
The knot got untied because of it
And the day where my heart my met you, ah,
Became its birthday
With you comes the best gifts
And I will never dream unless you're with me
I love you, and my words come(straight), ah,
From (deep) inside of me
I wasn't lucky in any day before you(came)
And my heart  has never leant towards any other person(but you)
Isn't it shocking that you ask me: do you love me?
Does that question needs to be asked in the first place?

arabic.title: الله شاهد
text: الله شاهد ع اللي بيا واديني كمان بقولك
احلامك بكرة جاية صدق قلبي اللي قالك
الله شاهد ع اللي بيا انا هاخد بالي منك
خليك قدام عنيا بتعب لو غبت عنك
اللّٰه شاهَدَ ع اللَيّ بَيا واديني كَمان بُقُولكِ
أَحْلامكِ بُكْرَة جاية صَدَقَ قَلْبِي اللَيّ قالَكِ
اللّٰه شاهَدَ ع اللَيّ بَيا أَنّا هاخد بِآلِيّ مِنكِ
خَلِيّكَ قُدّام عَنَيا بِتَعْب لُو غَبَّت عَنكِ
انت كل حاجة واللي مني
ليك عنيا وبس ترضى عني
حبيبي وعد مني عمر ما ارجع فيه
انت كل حاجة من انهاردة
وناوي اعيش حياتي للجمال ده
كفاية عندي تبقى عيني باصه عليه
أَنْتَ كُلّ حاجَة وَاللَيّ مِنِّي
لَيّكِ عَنَيا وَبَسَّ تَرَضَّى عَنِّي
حَبِيبَيْ وَعَدَّ مِنِّي عَمُرَ ما أَرْجَعَ فِيهِ
أَنْتَ كُلّ حاجَة مَن انهاردة
وَنَأْوِي أُعَيِّش حَياَتَيْ لِلجِمال ده
كِفايَة عِنْدِي تُبْقَى عَيْنَيْ باصهُ عَلِيّهُ
اللّٰه شاهَدَ ع اللَيّ بَيا واديني كَمان بُقُولكِ
أَحْلامكِ بُكْرَة جاية صَدَقَ قَلْبِي اللَيّ قالَكِ
اللّٰه شاهَدَ ع اللَيّ بَيا أَنّا هاخد بِآلِيّ مِنكِ
خَلِيّكَ قُدّام عَنَيا بِتَعْب لُو غَبَّت عَنكِ
لسه عند وعدي ليك يا عمري
كل حاجة فيا حتى عمري
ليك وقلبي جنبك انت عمره ماغاب
قلبي برضه حس باللي حسيت بيه
وقالي شوقه بان اهو في عنيه
عنده حق ياما لف وشاف
لسه عِنْدِ وَعْدَيْيَ لَيّكِ يا عُمْرِي
كُلّ حاجَة فَيا حَتَّى عُمْرِي
لَيّكِ وَقَلْبَيْيَ جَنَّبَكَ أَنْتَ عُمْرهُ ما غاب
قَلْبِي بَرَضَهُ حَسَّ بِاللَيّ حسيت بِيه
وقالي شَوَّقَهُ بِأَن أَهْو فِيَّ عنيه
عِنْدِهِ حَقّ ياما لَفَّ وَشافَ
احلم بحاجة وناديني اوام هتلاقيني قدام عنيك
غمض عيونك ثواني وفتحها تاني تبقى في ايديك

And I tell you your dreams will come true
Believe what my heart is telling you.
God is witness to what I am going through
I will take care of you
Stay where I can see you
I will suffer if you go away.

From this day you are everything
I will live my life for this beauty
To have you in sight is enough for me.
You are everything to me and part of me

arabic.title: الله يباركلي فيك
text: يا حبيبي من حبي فيك لا هتكلم ولا أغنيلك
من اليوم ده هأحبك حب جديد يخليني حبيبي أدعيلك
يا حبيبي من حبي فيك لا هتكلم ولا أغنيلك
من اليوم ده هأحبك حب جديد يخليني حبيبي أدعيلك
الله يباركلي فيك يا أغلى من عينيا ... الله يخليني ليك و اجيبلك الدنيا ديا
الله الله ... الله الله يحميك حبيبي يا عمري يا غالي ويخليك ليا
الله يباركلي فيك يا أغلى من عينيا ... الله يخليني ليك و اجيبلك الدنيا ديا

انا اهو قدامك وبين اديك ... انا كلي علشانك وملك ليك
انا اهو قدامك وبين اديك ... انا كلي علشانك وملك ليك
سألت قلبي بيحبك قد إيه ؟

وحاضنين بعض وحاضنين قوي

english.title: The Best is Yet to Come
text: This year was really, really difficult for us
But the important thing is that we ended up together
Hugging each other, hugging each other tightly
And still the best is yet to come
My darling, starting from tonight
I don’t want to think about anything except your love
And I’ll forget all the pain in my life
What’s coming is more beautiful as long as I am with you
X2
My heart went with you
And with you I forget my pain
And it’s enough what I lost
From my life when you were far from me
X2
My love, don’t let the world get you down
Not every day is hell
Did you ever hear about a time
That the sun didn’t rise after the night
And still the best is yet to come
My heart went with you
And with you I forget my pain
And it’s enough what I lost
From my life when you were far from me
X2
My darling, starting from tonight
I don’t want to think about anything except your love

arabic.title: اللي راح
text: انا اللي ياما قلبه انجرح وحبايبه خدوا منه
لا دقت يوم طعم الفرح ولا ناسي بيحنوا
وزي ما انت قسيت عليا لازم اقسى في يوم عليك
وزي ما بكيت عنيا خدت ايه الله يجازيك
واللي راح من عمري اهو راح
واللي شفته كله جراح
خلاص حبيبي عيش وارتاح
واللي جاي اهو كله سماح
يا اللي شفت الدنيا زيك والحنان مكنش عندك
كل يوم لك حال في حبك والقساوة مالكة قلبك
واللي راح من عمري اهو راح
واللي شفته كله جراح
خلاص حبيبي عيش وارتاح
واللي جاي اهو كله سماح

english.title: What Has Gone
text: I, whose heart many times has been wounded
And his dear ones took from him
Never a day tasted happiness
Or have you forgotten, or have you forgotten
And like you were harsh on me
I have to one day be harsh on you
And like you made my eyes cry
What did you get? God will return(×2)
And what went from my life has gone
And what I saw was all wounds
It's over my dear live and relax
And what is coming is all forgiveness(×2)
You how I saw the world like you
And the tenderness wasn't with you
And every day is a case in your love
And the cruelty possesses your heart
And what went from my life has gone
And what I saw was all wounds
It's over my dear live and relax
And what is coming is all forgiveness(×2)

ده الموضوع فيك

علشان فى اقل منك كتير
بدأوا من تحت الصفر وعدوا

لينا رب كبير

arabic.title: الوحيدة
text: الوحيدة اللى انا حبيتها من كل قلبي بجد..
لاعمري شكيت فيها..
و لا غيرها حسيت حد..
ده انا كنت فاكرها ليا..
اتاريها لأى حد..
فهمتها غلط يا قلبي و اللوم مش عليها..
اللوم عليك انت يا قلبي..
انك صدقت عنيها..
قال و انا بخاف عليها..
قال و انا بغير عليها..
قال و انا ما عرفش افرح غير لما اشوف الفرحة في عنيها..
اكيد انا هلاقي غيرها..
و هانسى انا و لا هفتكرها..
مش عشان و احدة غريبة يبقى كله زيها..
لأ..في الف غيرها

english.title: Al-wa7ida
text: You are the only one I truly loved with all my heart
I had never complained about you
I had never felt for another (like I feel for you)
This whole time I thought she was all mine
Apparently she's for anyone
Oh heart, you misunderstood her and she is not to blame
The blame is on you, my heart
Because you believed her eyes
And you'd say you're worried about her
And you'd say you're jealous for her
And you'd say you couldn't be happy until you saw happiness in her eyes
Of course I will find another
And I'll forget about her completely
Just because one girl was odd doesn't mean all girls are like that
No.. there are a thousand others

وأنا عليا إني أسامح وأكمل ولا ما اسامحكيش
عارف ممكن تكوني زعلانه عشان حاسه اني أنا
ممكن أكون اتدايئت .. لما حكيت كل ماضيكي
أنا بحبك زي منتي .. إوعي في يوم تكوني زعلانه
مش فارقه عندي حاجه في كل ماضيكي

يااااه ..
إيه يعني عدت عليكي ظروف

مهو اللي يعيش ياما يشوف .. ياما يشوف ياما يشوف
أنا جنبك يعني متخافيش .. لو غبتي عني مش عايز أعيش

english.title: i'm beside you
text: Didn't you say the truth
and you didn't hide it ?  then don't be afraid
And it's up to me to forgive you and go on or not forgive you
I know that you can be sad because you feel that i could be upset... when you talked about all your past
I love you as you are... don't you ever be sad
I don't care about anything from your past
i'm beside you so don't be afraid.. if you leave me i don't want to live
No problem you still don't know how much you mean to me
Please don't cry... everyone want to live at your service...there is no one like you in this world
So what if you had difficult circumstances
it's normal to meet people who do not deserve you in this world
as long as you live you will see more
i'm beside you so don't be afraid.. if you leave me i don't want to live
No problem you still don't know how much you mean to me
Please don't cry... everyone want to live at your service...there is no one like you in this world
There are things i lived with him

arabic.title: انت مشيت
text: انا هنا بناديك فين الاقيك طمنى عليك عامل ايه
انا هنا تعبان بقالى زمان ياحبيبى حرام معقول يرضيك
انت مشيت ونسيت قلبى معاك ولا عارف بس ازاى هنساك
ده انا حتى بتنفس هواك وكل مافيا سيبته معاك
كان نفسى اكمل عمرى معاك انا عندى كتير لسه لهواك
ليه مادتنيش فرصة ياحبيبى ليه حكمت عليا انى انساك

english.title: You Left
text: I am here, calling you.. Where can I find you? Let me know you're fine, how are you doing?
I am here growing weary since ages my love, it's not fair, is it possible that that contents you?
You left and forgot my heart with you; I don't know how I will ever forget you
I even breath your love and all that I am, I have left with you
I had wished to continue my life with you, I still have so much of your love
Why didn't you give me a chance, oh love? Why did you condemn me to forgetting you?
I am here growing weary since ages my love, it's not fair, is it possible that that contents you?

arabic.title: انتي اللى عملتى
text: إنتي اللي عملتي لكل شباب الدنيا قلق ... وعملتي قلوبهم إسورة وخلخال ورق
أنا كنت ناوي لما اشوفك اسرقك ... واخد بتار كل اللي قلبه بيعشقك
أول ما شفتك قلت سبحان من خلق ... قلبي اتفلق نصين علشان يبقى الحلق
قالوا حبيبيها لا جه زمانه ولا اتولد ... وضحكت ضحكة كبرياء أشطر ولد
ووعدتهم اسكن في حضنك للأبد ... وجيت علشان أكسب أنا لوحدي السبق
أقوى القلوب كانت أوام تتهزلك ... وأنا كنت ناوي أحكم هواكي و ازلزلك
و إن كنتي مغرورة وعليا أنزلك ... وتعلني خبر إنتصاري على الملأ

arabic.title: بينك وبينى
text: قوللى إيه محبوبى إيه بينك وبينى
كل ما آجى واروح مكان متخايلة عينى
خطوة خطوة تشوف عينيا
مركبة ونزلت ف مية
ياللى عودك مال عليا
زى عود الورد لما الورد يحضن ف الجناينى
قوللى إيه محبوبى إيه بينك وبينى
كل ما آجى واروح مكان متخايلة عينى
لك عيون غريبين غرابة
والغرام دا قتلنى يابا
خلى قلبى يلعب ربابة
وقام يسقف على الإيديني
رغم دوّه بيجي سيرته
سويته انت حتة حتة
حتى عمرى قلع الجاكيته
وبدّل اللون الحزينى
قوللى إيه محبوبى إيه بينك وبينى
كل ما آجى واروح مكان متخايلة عينى
كنت انا الحاكم بأمره
والجمال ده انا تحت امره
سيبلى قلبى مديون بعمره
بس اوعى تفك دينى
للعيون بدعى عشانهم
بس اعيش عمرين حالهم
وافضل اتملى ف جمالهم
وصلوا على جد الحسين
وقوللى إيه محبوبى إيه بينك وبينى
كل ما آجى واروح مكان متخايلة عينى

english.title: Between you and me
text: Tell me what is it, Oh, my beloved, What is it between you and me?
I keep on seeing your phantom everywhere I go
With every step my eye starts to see (clearer),
as if a boat was sliding down onto water,1
as a branch of roses with roses embracing the gardener.
Tell me what is it, Oh, my beloved, What is it between you and me?
I keep on seeing your phantom everywhere I go
Your eyes, how strange are they?
This love has already killed me,
made my heart play on rebab2
and started to clap in my hands
In spite of that and as it has been mentioned ...3
You burnt it completely4
Even my life took off its jacket
and changed the black color5
Tell me what is it, Oh, my beloved, What is it between you and me?
I keep on seeing your phantom everywhere I go
I used to be a tyrant6
and (now) I'm under command of this beauty
Keep me my heart owing you life
and never pay me back my loan.
For these eyes I pray
(I'd have done so) if only I had lived for two whole lives
I'd have been staring at them
So say you all "Peace be on prophet".7
Tell me what is it, Oh, my beloved, What is it between you and me?
I keep on seeing your phantom everywhere I go

arabic.title: تاعبة كل الناس
text: انا شايف دلوقتى قدامى واحدة هيجرالى حاجة لومكلمتهاش
ماشفتش ف جمالها انا اى واحدة هيجرالى حاجة لو ماعرفتهاش
واعمل ايه وانتى تاعبة كدا كـل الناس وانـا واحـد م الناس اللى دابوا فيكى
وانا كنت فاكر نفسى كدا ف الغرام أستاذ ياتاعبة كل الناس جبتينى بعينيكى
ايه يابنتى ( ياجامدة ) اللى انتى عملتيه فيا مش قادر اشيل عينيا من عليكى
معقول تمشينى المشية ديا ينفع كدا طب نظرة ليا طب ليه كدا طب اسلم عليكى

I'm one of those people who fell in love with you
I've always thought that I'm a master in love

You've captured me with your eyes
So what have you done to me!
I can't take my eyes away from you
I can't imagine you've led me to this condition
Is this really pleasing you?
Well, have a look at me
Well, why are you doing this to me?
Well let me shake hands with you

arabic.title: تعالى ارجع تانى
text: عرفت اللى فيها .. عرفت اللى فيها
والله تعبت ياحبيبى تعبت مابقتش انا بتاع زمان
من يوم مابعدت آه عنى وغبت وحياتى ضاع منها الامان
تعالى ارجع تانى معقول قادر تنسانى
وغيرى خد مكانى والله بتعذب
اسمعنى بنده عليك حالى هيصعب عليك
لو شفتنى بعينيك والله مش بكدب
بعدك انا ضعت كتير وبقيت اضعف كتير
قصاد اى كلمة ممكن تنسينى حبى ليك
مش عايز أكون كدا لانى انا اصلا مش كدا
وحياتى ترجع ترجعلى نفسى محتاج اليك
ليه كل اللى ياما حبيبى ارجع ياحبيبى ارجع لحضنى ياحبيبى ماتسيبنيش
اه ياحبيبى مش عارف اعيش من بعدك اه ياحبيبى

english.title: Come back again
text: I knew her
Swear to God my darling I am tired,
The time stopped for me,
From the day you left me and got lost,
And the peace left my life,
Come! Come back again don't say you can forget me,
And someone else has filled my place i will be tortured,
Hear me I am calling you my situation is getting harder for you,
And if you see me with your eyes you will see that I do not tell lie.
After you I wasted and became weak more and more,
Which word can make you forget my love to you?
I don't want to be like this because I'm not this at all,
And my life comes back if you return to me,
I need you,
Why's all that my darling?
Come back my darling, come back to my embrace, my darling don't leave me,
I csnt not live after you my darling.

ما حسبتهوش

english.title: The price of a choice
text: my heart was taken over by a new feeling
and my eyes didn't look farther
and I didn't find what I was waiting for
since that day, my life's got no morning
I'm paying the price of a choice
I didn't think over
I didn't think over
It's my fault, it's my fault, because
I had drawn tomorrow with the eye of a time
when I saw the truth
I couldn't fit it in
my absent dream that never came
the present that I've lived has fooled me
and walked me on a path
and a promise that I will find you there
my heart, enough with
the bleeding of dreams and wasting years
and who can guarantee the remaining of the life to risk it
my heart, where are you? enough with your silence
the joy of life is passing
and we've never lived it
and we've never lived it
why do you accept being a prisoner
and there's a lot to come in our life
but they never came
but they never came
and how could my eyes see the light
or the steps of the days that are moving
when there's a wall between us

arabic.title: جرى إيه يا عيني
text: يا عيني ليه بتدمعي ما حبيبنا سابنا خلاص وراح
دلوقتي نفسك ترجعي ومستعده تنسي الجراح
ليه كدا يا عيني
من تاني يوم في فراقنا انا وانتي ليه اشتقنا
مش كنا قولنا وداع مش كنا خلاص فارقنا
دلوقتي ايه غيرنا ع البعد ليه ما قدرنا
من تاني يوم انا وانتي رجعنا ليه ف كلامنا
جرى ايه يا عيني هو انتي برضو هتكسفيني وتبكي بجد
واحنا اللي عمرنا ما عملناها مرة وبكينا ف يوم على حد
ما تردي عليا ردي عليا ولا هيا مش اي حد
بعدنا يا قلبي عنه ولسه كلامنا عنه
وكمان واحشنا اكتر والبعد مفيش اصعب منه

arabic.title: حبيبي خلاص
text: حبيبي خلاص انا اختارتك تكون ليا، و انا المسؤول
و م اليوم ده هكون جنبك ومش منقول
صاحيلك كل يوم بدري ويومي معدول
قصاد الناس في حاجة أحب تعرفها ياريت عني
انا بعدك مفيش ولا حاجة تلزمني
و عنك مستحيل حاجة هتمنعني
و ان شالله تفضل يا حبيبى معايا ومتسبنيش
ان شالله تبقى على طول قدامي ومتمشيش
آه والله انت اللي غيابه لو طال والله مقدرش أعيش
بقالي سنين قاعد مستني تيجي فرصة أقرب ليك
مبهتمش بحاجة أصلاً في يوم غير بيك
ومجرد عيني ما تغمض انا بحلم بيك
أساساً مين هيملى حبيبي عيني غيرك مفيش ده اكيد
ده مجنون مين تكون جنبه ويبص بعيد
معاك الدنيا أحلى وكل يوم في جديد
و ان شالله تفضل يا حبيبى معايا ومتسبنيش
ان شالله تبقى على طول قدامي ومتمشيش
آه والله انت اللي غيابه لو طال والله مقدرش أعيش

I am Responsible for this choice
From this day on,
I will always be by your side and will never depart
Every day,I wake up early for you and my day will be nice
In front of all people,I wish you know something about me
That is without you,nothing else matters
No power on earth will stop me from being with yoı

In God's will,you stay in front of me forever and desert me not

You,if your absence took long,I swear I cannot live
For years and years,
I have been waiting for a chance to get close to you
I never cared for anything in my day but you
As soon as I close my eyes,I dream of you

that is for sure

With you,life is so much sweeter,
every day is a new adventure
In God's will,
In God's will,my love,you stay with me and leave me not
In God's will,you stay in front of me forever and desert me not
O God!
You,if your absence took long,I swear I cannot live

ولا ده احساس علشان زعلان ودلوقتيي انا وانت ياقلبى بنفكر غلط اااه
يمكن عشان اهماله ليااااا وانه معيشنى على طول فى عذاااب ولا ياقلبى
انا وانت طلعنا ولا يملى عنينا ياقلبى غير التراب
وواخدنى قلبى ورايح فين فين فين فين انا شكلى كده حبيت اتنين
وواخدنى قلبى ورايح فين فين فين فين انا شكلى كده بظلم قلبين
طيب ينفع لا لا لا
لالالا ياقلبي لالالا ياقلبييييييييييي لا لا لا

english.title: I loved two ones?
text: What does "I love someone and think about another  one " even mean?
Seriously, I really, really don't understand
What does"I don't want to leave someone but in the same time want the other one, too"?
I honestly, honestly feel that this  is odd
I must think and find a solution,
I couldn't  do anything, but I must try hard and achieve it
Everyday I become more attracted, more attracted,
I don't want to think of myself more as a small man
Where are you taking, my heart? It looks like I am in love with two people simultaneously
So is it OK now? No, no, no, my heart
Is it possible that I met the right person,
In the wrong, wrong time? Oh
Or is this a feeling that I am getting because I'm upset?
And now you and I, my heart, think falsely?
Maybe it is because he/she doesn't care much about me, and let me all the time be in pain?
Or is it because of the tough reality that nothing satisfy you and me, oh my heart?
Oh my heart, you're taking me and going where? It looks like that I loved two people
Oh my heart, you're taking me and going where? It looks like that I loved two people, it looks like I am going to make two people suffer
So it that OK now, my heart? No, no, no
No, no, no, my heart, no no no my heaaaart, no no no and no!

arabic.title: حد شبهه
text: بعد فترة من فراقنا
راضي انا ومرتاح في حالي
مش بفكر ليه افترقنا
او بسيب نفسي لخيالي
خدت انا ع الحال ده يمكن
او لان مفيش بديل
مش بفكر حتى ممكن
نرجع ولا مستحيل
لا ياقلبي ده حد شبهه
امشي عادي مش قضية
للاسف فى حد ندهه
وحروف اسمه هي هي
نفس شكله نفس ملامحه
والبراءة اللي في عينيه
بس عادي شكل جرحي
اتنسى ومبنش فيه
بص شافني طبعا عرفني
بس متهزش كتير
زي مايكون مش ظالمني
او مشفش معايا خيري
لو وجودي كان هيفرق
كان هيفرق من زمان
بكرة هانسى اكيد وهلقى
حد غيره في الحياة
لا ياقلبي ده حد شبهه
امشي عادي مش قضية
للاسف فى حد ندهه
وحروف اسمه هي هي
نفس شكله نفس ملامحه
والبراءة اللي في عينيه
بس عادي شكل جرحي
اتنسى ومبنش فيه
لا ياقلبي ده حد شبهه
امشي عادي مش قضية
للاسف فى حد ندهه
وحروف اسمه هي هي
ده احنا لو سلمنا حتى
كان سلامنا هايفرق ايه

english.title: Someone like her
text: After time since we broke up
I´m happy, and pleased with my time
Im not thinking of why we broke up
Or leave my self to my imagination
Im maybe habituate now,
Or because there is no replacement
Im not thinking of maybe,
We will be back together
No, this is someone like her
This is something normal
Unforunately, someone called her
And the letters of her name is the same
She has the same character, and same face.
And the innocent in her eyes
But this normal, the face is hurting me
Is forgotten
She looked at me, of course she knew me
But she dosen´t shake much
As she knew she didn´t hurt me
Or did´nt see the best with me
If my  present don´t make difference
Have made difference for long time ago
Tomorrow will I forget, and find
Someone else in this life
No, this is someone like her
This is something normal
Unforunately, someone called her
And the letters of her name is the same
She has the same character, and same face.
And the innocent in her eyes
But this normal, the face is hurting me
Is forgotten
No, this is someone like her
This is something normal
Unforunately, someone called her
And the letters of her name is the same
Even If we said HI to each other
It would not make any difference

text: خليه يمشي ياقلبي ويبعد ويدور ويشوف

english.title: the arms of a stranger
text: let him walk away, my heart, let him go his distance, then turn around and see
tomorrow he will cry, my heart, and will come back like a bird flying home (as when a bird comes back after its migration, he comes back excited..)
he'll look for the gentleness and love that we had in the past/that belonged in the past, but he wont find anything like us (as in the love that we had)
how ever much he goes and stays away, its still the arms of a stranger
its not the same as our arms
he'll look for the gentleness and love that we had in the past/that belonged in the past, but he wont find anything like us (as in the love that we had)
how ever much he goes and stays away, its still the arms of a stranger
its not the same as our arms..its not the same as our arms
he used to see us, and run towards us, the light and warmth in him were for us, for our eyes (litely: for our eyes)
and in a moment, he went and did not come (back)
as if he did not see us, my heart, but now, at this time, he does see us
he used to see us, and run towards us, the light and warmth in him were for us, for our eyes (litely: for our eyes)
and in a moment, he went and did not come (back)
as if he did not see us, my heart, but now, at this time, he does see us
he'll look for the gentleness and love that we had in the past/that belonged in the past, but he wont find anything like us (as in the love that we had)
how ever much he goes and stays away, its still the arms of a stranger
its not the same as our arms..its not the same as our arms
aaaah- a sound of pain, being upset
in all my life, i never expected, thought
that all this betrayil would come from him, that he would forget our story
tomorrow (ie: in the future), he'll see trouble/pain from others, and then he'll know our value
in all my life, i never expected, thought
that all this betrayil would come from him, that he would forget our story
tomorrow (ie: in the future), he'll see trouble/pain from others, and then he'll know our value
he'll look for the gentleness and love that we had in the past/that belonged in the past, but he wont find anything like us (as in the love that we had)
how ever much he goes and stays away, its still the arms of a stranger
its not the same as our arms..its not the same as our arms
he'll look for the gentleness and love that we had in the past/that belonged in the past, but he wont find anything like us (as in the love that we had)
how ever much he goes and stays away, its still the arms of a stranger
its not the same as our arms..its not the same as our arms

arabic.title: حكايات الحب
text: كام مرة يا حب عليا ناديت
روحت بأحلامي معاك ومشيت
ورجعت طريقك زيي ما جيت
وفضلي حكاية وذكرى معاك
كام مرة بظلمك يا ليالي
تجيبيلى غريب تاخديه غالي
ويغيب ولا بيغيب عن بالي
حسه في أيامى ولا بنسى
حكايات الحب وأحلامي
بلقاها في كل مكان يتراح
يتاخد قلبي لسابع سما
وألاقيه إترمى بعدها في جراح
وأهرب من حضن أتدارى في حضن
أتارينى بداوى الحزن بحزن
هنا كانلي حكاية بغنيلها
من قلبي فرحت في أولها
وحلمت نصيبي يكملها
لكن خليت بينا الأيام
هنا حلم قديم قولت هيبقى
وأخيرًا هفرح وأبقى معاه
الحضن اللى إتاخد سرقة
من غير لا وداع حتى ولا سلام

english.title: Love stories
text: OH love how many times did you call me
Took my dreams and went away
Went back to where you came from
And only left me a story and a memory of you
Oh nights how many times did I wrong you
You bring me a stranger and take them back as a precious
And they go away but not from my mind
I feel them through my days and never forget
Love stories and my dreams
I find them everywhere to go
My heart gets taken up to the seventh sky
And then I find it thrown into wounds
And I run away from one hug to hide in another
To find out that I am healing one grief with another
Here I had a story that I sang for
From my heart I was happy at its beginning
And I dreamed that my fate would make it last
But the days turned us down
Here there was an old dream I thought it would last
And at last I'd be happy and be with it
The hug that was stolen
Without a goodbye nor even a bye

arabic.title: حلم سنين
text: حلم سنين
حلم سنين
عشنا وشفناه
اليوم اللي اشتاقناله
واحضني قصاد الناس
يا حبيبي وماله
مابقينا لبعض خلاص
زادو العشاق اتنين
اكتب اسامينا
كان حلم سنين وسنين
نبقي لبعضينا
الله على دا الاحساس
ليلة وانت جنبي ليلة
تسوي عمري ليلة
بألف ليله معاك
انا قلبى خلاص هتنام علي صوت دقاته
هيعيش وياك على طول اجمل اوقاته
حبك ولا يوم هنساه
انا قد القول ومعاك وفيت بوعودي
وانت استنيت وبقيت محتاج لوجودي
واهو ربنا جمعنا
يا ليالي
يال يالي
يا ليالي احكيله علي حالي
كنت فين
آه كنت فين
يا حبيبي ده انت
حلم سنين

english.title: The Dream of Years
text: The dream of years
The dream of years
we've lived and realized it
the day that we've been longing for
and, hold me before people
what's wrong with that
haven't you become mine and I'm yours?
lovers have increased by two
write our names
it was a dream for many years
that I become yours and you become mine
Oh, how beautiful is this feeling!
the night when you're by my side
is a night that's worth
a thousand night of my life
at last, you're going to sleep to my heartbeat
it's going to live its best times with you
I will not forget your love, not even for a day
I was a man of my word and I've fulfilled my promises to you
and you've waited and became in need for my presence
and here we are, united by the power of God
O'nights
O'nights
O'nights, tell her about how I am
where have you been?
where have you been?
my love, you are
the dream of years

english.title: A dream for many years
text: A dream for many years
A dream for many years
We lived and saw it
The day that we missed him in
And hugged me in front of the people
Oh my love what happened
We won't stay together, are you sure
The lovers increased two people
Write our names
It was a dream for many years and years
Staying together
Oh my god what's this feeling
A night with you is a night
Can make my life like a night
In a thousand years with you
OK, you will sleep with the beats of my heart
And it will live with you his great moments forever
I won't forget your love never
Certainly I can do that, And I fulfilled my promise
You waited and remained in need of me
And the god made us meet each other
Oh the nights
Oh the nights
Oh the nights, please tell him about my case
Where I was
Oh where I was
My dear, this is you
A dream for many years

arabic.title: حلو المكان (Helw al makan)
text: حلو المكان . .
ياصحاب زمان
جينا الليلادي هنسهر فيه ونغني كمان
متجمعين ومنورين
وحشاني فعلا قعدتنا ولمة زماان
هنقضي يوم ضحك و هزار
ودماغنا رايقه ولسة شباب محنا اش كبار
ومتدفعوش عندي الحسااب
وهنمشي اول مايقولوا طلع النهاار
عايزين نولع الدنيا
. . نولع الدنيا والليلة نفرح كلنا
. . ااه كلنا مش طالبه حزن ولا ثانيه
. . حزن ولا ثانيه ولا هم يدخل وسطنا
. . ااه وسطنا
هنلاقي فرحة و التانيه و الليلة لسه محوشه
اليوم جميل و المود تمام
و الليلة حلوة ميشغلناش الساعه كام
واللي مجااش ميلازمناش
وكفاية روحنا و لمتنا بحب و سلاام
السهرة دي جات في المعاد
وياعم بس مكشر ليه ماتضحك يواد
عندي العلاج وع المزاج
الليلة كله هيدلع مفهاش قعااد

english.title: The Place is Beautiful
text: The place is beautiful, oh old friends.
We came this night to stay up in it and to sing as well,
We're gathered and we're shining.
I really miss us sitting together and I miss the gathering of old days,
We'll spend the day of laughing and joking,
Our minds are relaxed and still young, we're not old,
And don't pay, I will,
And we'll go to the moment they say morning has come.
We want to light up the world.
To light up the world.
And tonight all of us will be happy,
Yes, all of us.
We don't want (sadness for even a second)×2,
Nor sorrow should come between us,
Oh between us.
We'll find a happiness after happiness,
And the night still has more to come.
The day is beautiful and the mood is good,
And the night is beautiful,
we don't care about what time it is,
And we don't need those who didn't come.
It's enough that we went and it gathered us with love and peace.
This evening came on time,
And oh man,
why are you grimacer? Aren't you going to laugh?
I have the cure and it's as the mood wants,
And tonight everyone should be spoiled, there would be no sitting down.
We want to light up the world. To light up the world,
And tonight all of us will be happy.
Yes, all of us.
We don't want (sadness for even a second)×2
Nor should sorrow come between us,
Oh between us.
We'll find happiness after happiness.
And the night still has more to come.

arabic.title: حياتى فداك
text: أول ماييجى انا هحلفه ف قلبى حبه وهوصفله من اد ايه وانا بستناه
كلمة وبقولها انا ليك وقفت حياتى عليك هتعيش خلاص جوايا ولايوم هفرط فيك
غايب بفكر فيك قدامى بشتاق ليك كلمة حبيبى بداية انا لسه هوصف فيك
بيحسدونى عليك ياللى ماليش بعديك
انا كنت ايه قبليك اياك تغيب عنى
انا قلبى لما لقاك حب الحياه وياك
تخلص حياتى فداك ولا يوم تروح منى
انا خدت قرار ف حياتى عمرك ماهتزعل منى
ده انت اغلى من حياتى واقرب ليا منى
وده وعد منى انا ليك هتكون راحتى انى ارضيك
ومهما هيحصل ليا انا تحت أمر عينيك

english.title: My life for you
text: At first glance I promised that her love is in my heart
And I describe how looong I was waiting for her
I say a word to her: I sacrify my life for you and I'm yours.
You will live in peace and I never bother you
In the absence I think you are in front of me and I am eager for you
The word 'my darling' just is the beginning of expressing (my love to you)
(means I can not express my feelings by words)
Others are jealous of you, the one who there's no future for me without you
What was I before you?! Don't leave me
My heart while meets you, feels tendency to life with you make me feel relaxed and don't go away from me any day
I decided not to make you feel sad in the life
You are more precious than my life and closer to me than myself
And I swear to feel happy whenever I could make you glad
And no matter what happens I am under the control of your eyes.

arabic.title: خنتك امبارح
text: عارفة ايه اللى اخرنى واللى كان مسهرنى
مش تفكيرى فيكى زى كل يوم اللى دايما مسهرنى
انا خونتك امبارح وقلبى مش مسامح
مش مسامح نفسى ولاعارف ازاى ده حصل منى
وازاى اخون نفسى ماهو انتى عندى نفسى
مادمعيش انا ماستاهلش دموعك اغلى منى
سامحينى انا الغلطان وادينى ببكى وندمان
مش مسامح نفسى ولاعارف ازاى ده حصل منى
فيه ناس كتير مابيحسوش بقيمة اللى معاهم وف ايدهم
الا لما يروح ومايرجعلوش ويظهر ان انا واحد منهم

english.title: I betrayed you last night
text: Do you know what makes me stay late at night and makes me so sleepless?
Not thinking of you like everyday makes so sleepless
I betrayed you last night and my heart doesn't forgive me
I don't forgive myself and i don't know how could i do thi
How can i betray myself and you are me
Don't cry i don't deserve your tears are more precious than me
Forgive me i made a mistake and here im crying and regret
I don't forgive myself and i don't know how could i do this
There are many people, who don't know the value of those who are with them and in their hands
Only when they go and don't come back
It seems like i'm one of them

arabic.title: دانا بابا
text: مفيش حد اعرفه فى كل الناس شافك
الا لما قال
انك اجمل واحده عيونك آيــه
من الجمال
وانه دايب واقع ميت فيكى
والله عال
وانتى ولا هنا وعادى
جدا جدا ولا فى الدمااغ
كلو متجنن عليكى بيتخانق
علشانك
وبيتمنوا الرضى ترضى وانتى ولا حركه
فى مكانك
كلو متثبت متسستم مستنى كلمه جنابك
وانتى ولا هنا وعادى
جدا جدا ولا فى الدمااغ
الا انا الا انا
انا لا حاسبى دانا بابا
الا انا الا انا
يا قمر بعيون كـدابـه
الا انا الا انا
انا لا حاسبى دانا بابا
عارفك هتموتى عليا
لكن انا ولا فى الدمااغ
شايف فى عينيكى انا نظرت ثقه اوى
والنبى لا تهدى
وطالعه فى السما و يـا ارض اتهدى
ما عليكى ادى
وغرورك وتناكتك وانا عاجبك
اصلاً من بدرى
وانا فاهمك خبزك عجنك جايبك جدا
فاهم الدماغ
ماشيه تبتسمى لكل الى معايا .. وانا لا
قال كدا هتجنن و قلبى هيزيدله
يا حرام كام دقه
وافضل شاغل نفسى بفكرك لوجودك

english.title: rehlet el hayah
text: On the journey of life,people are not similar
We purchased round-trip tickets
Hearts are exchanged,addresses are changed
A sieve sifts because life is short
Everyone is confused because we have to choose
No one feels safe in the dark and no one can guarantee the light
We don't know where we're going
We were born angels but raised on evil
And no matter how long life is,sometimes it betrays us
and at it's end ,we count it as two or three hours passed

arabic.title: صباح الخير يا مصر

على كل شبر فـ بلدنا
صباح الخير

وعلى اللي منها

امل السنين

O sweeter three colors and Eagle

Every inch in our country
good morning
The church and the mosque
good morning
on streets  and squares
on its sweet people
on us
on the brave Saaideh* and peasant
on manufacturers , farmers and fishermen
good morning
on its citizens
And on those living in it
and on those overseas
good morning
on teachers and the students
on those who are the future hope
O good morning on the millions people
good morning Egypt

arabic.title: صحيت على صوتها
text: انا النهاردة صحيت على صوتها
الله على ده صوت ده كان واحشني موت
ما هي دي اللي كان زمان
معاها بنسى كل الناس
قالتلي نرجع بس بشروطها
قولتلها متفقين يا ستي وموافقين
ومش هبص لحد غيرك من النهاردة خلاص
أَنا النهاردة صَحِيَت عَلِيّ صَوّتِها
اللّٰه عَلِيّ ده صَوَّت ده كانَ واحشني مَوَّت
ما هِيَ دِي اللَيّ كانَ زَمان
مِعاها بِنَسْي كُلّ الناس
قالتلي نُرْجَع بَسَّ بِشُرُوطها
قولتلها مُتَّفِقِيْنَ يا سِتَّيْ وَمُوافِقَيْنِ
وَمِشّ هبص لِحَدّ غَيَّرَكِ مَن النهاردة خَلاص
جرحت انا فيها كنت عايش ومقضيها
ياما جبت عاليها واطيها
ايوة كنت زمان غلطان
عرفت قيمتها مش كلام ولا انا بثبتها
دي الوحيدة اللي انا حبيتها
واللي روحي معاها كمان
جُرِحتُ أَنا فِيها كُنتِ عايِش وَمَقْضِيّها
ياما جُبتِ عالِيها واطِيها
ايوة كُنتِ زَمان غَلَطانِ
عَرَّفتِ قَيَّمتَها مِشّ كَلام وَلا أَنا بثبتها
دِي الوَحِيدَة اللَيّ أَنا حُبِّيّتها
وَاللَيّ رُوحِيّ مِعاها كَمان
ايام كتيرة وقفت في مكاني
كان قلبي مش مرتاح عايش وكلي جراح
وقولت لو رجعتلي تاني عمري ما هبيعها
في البعد كانت حاجة نقصاني
انا كنت مش مبسوط تايه ومش مظبوط
دلوقتي جاتلي فرصة تانية ومش هضيعها
جُرِحتُ أَنا فِيها كُنتِ عايِش وَمَقْضِيّها
ياما جُبتِ عالِيها واطِيها
ايوة كُنتِ زَمان غَلَطانِ
عَرَّفتِ قَيَّمتَها مِشّ كَلام وَلا أَنا بثبتها
دِي الوَحِيدَة اللَيّ أَنا حُبِّيّتها
وَاللَيّ رُوحِيّ مِعاها كَمان

english.title: I woke up to her voice
text: Today I woke up to her voice... How beautiful this voice, I missed it alot.  She is the one who made me forget all the people when I was with her.  She said to get back together but on her conditions.  I told her that I agree and that I won't look at anyone but her from this day on.

Today I woke up to her voice... How beautiful this voice, I missed it alot.  She is the one who made me forget all the people when I was with her.  She said to get back together but on her conditions.  I told her that I agree and that I won't look at anyone but her from this day on.

I hurt her a lot, I was living my life, I made her mad a lot, Oh yes, I used to be wrong. I found out how valuable she is, it's not just words and I'm not trying to prove it, She is the only one that I loved, and my soul is with her too.. A lot of day I stood in my place, my heart was not comfortable, I was living with wounds, I said that if she returned I would never sell her, When I was away there was something missing for me, I wasn't happy, I was lost and not okay, And now a chance came to me that I will not lose...

I hurt her a lot, I was living my life, I made her mad a lot, Oh yes, I used to be wrong. I found out how valuable she is, it's not just words and I'm not trying to prove it, She is the only one that I loved, and my soul is with her too

text: قدام الناس ياحبيبى انسى اللى فات من النهاردة
ونبدا حياتنا انا وانت حبيبى
بصفحة جديدة من النهاردة صفحة جديدة
وانا عارف ان انا معاكى هلاقى حياتى الجاية
وهاعوض اللى فات منها وياكى
فى دنيايا وحياة تعبى وايامى لاكونلك ضهر
واتحدى كل الدنيا عشانك ياللى مكانك جوايا
لا لا ولا عندى اغلى منك لا لا ولا تسوى الدنيا جنبـك
اه فى البعد بموت بمووت اه وعمري بيفوت صفحة جديدة

arabic.title: صوتك
text: صوتك متغير كده ليه فى حد جنبك ولا ايه
خلاص فهمت وهقفل بس قبل ماقفل سلميلى عليه
وقولي له ياخد باله منك زى ما كنت انا بخاف عليكى
ويحاول على قد مايقدر يحميكى ويحافظ عليكى
ليه عملتى كدا مع واحد حبك كدا كان كل زنبه
ان اداكى كله ما عنده وخلاكى اغلى ما عنده
وفى الاخر تبقى نهايته كدا
فرحانه باللى جنبك طبعا ماهو زيك وشبهك فعلا
بكره هيعمل فيكى زى ماعملتى كدا
وقولي له ياخد باله منك زى ما كنت انا بخاف عليكى
ويحاول على قد مايقدر يحميكى ويحافظ عليكى

arabic.title: ضحكتها مبتهزرش
text: ضحكتها مبتهزرش وجمالها ميتقدرش
وياقلبى متستهترش بواحده فى رقتها
واحده زيك فى جمالك فى دلالك وشقاوتك وحلاوتك
لو وقعت فى ايدى هخلى نهارها مش فايت
وبقولها وانا صاحى وفايق وياريت اليوم ده ييجى
وجه اليوم اللى بتمناه واللى بستناه واللى بحلم بيه
وجه اليوم اللى هبقى معاه واللى هعيش وياه فى حضن عنيه
عنيكى بتندهلى من نظرة جابتنى جابت اهلى وعلى بيتك مش على مهلى يا حبيبة الروح
طول عمرى انا مستنى لحظة ماتعيشى فى حضنى وفى عيونى وفى الننى دانا دايب دوب
وجه اليوم اللى بتمناه واللى بستناه واللى بحلم بيه
وجه اليوم اللى هبقى معاه واللى هعيش وياه فى حضن عنيه

arabic.title: عرفت اللي فيها
text: عرفت اللي فيها، عينيه بان عليها
يا قلبي انه محبنيش
حاجات عشنا ليها وعشمني بيها
وآخرتها ليه طلعت مفيش
ليه كل اللي ياما وعدني بيه
واللي اتفقنا زمان عليه
ينساه وليه ما ينسنيش
ايه دلوقتي شكلي هيبقى ايه
وياريتني اعرف بس ليه
كان ليا فيه وبقيت ماليش
سنين عشتهاله وعيشتهاله
وحاجات كتير متتحكيش
ومعرفش ماله مبقاش في باله
أموت يا قلبي ولا أعيش
ليه كل اللي ياما وعدني بيه
واللي اتفقنا زمان عليه
ينساه وليه ما ينسنيش
ايه دلوقتي شكلي هيبقى ايه
وياريتني اعرف بس ليه
كان ليا فيه وبقيت ماليش
