what does it mean that your love stole my heart, soul & mind
and I never find myself except when you're in my arms
and my heart loves you, ooh ooh...
oooooooh...
what does it mean when all my talk is about you
what does it mean when I never see anything but your picture
and even my voice doesn't speak anything but your name
what does it mean that everywhere I go I see you next to me
what does it mean that your love stole my heart, soul & mind
and I never find myself except when you're in my arms

arabic.title: عيش بشوقك
text: لو من تقل الهم عليك، فاض بيك
لو ليك اي شكوي، متشتكيش و اسمع نصايحي
ولو الدنيا مغلباك و مشقلباك
وخداك غسيل و مكوي
البسلها الوش الفرايحي
و إن كنت مفلس خالص خالص و محلتكش جنية
قول علي الجزمة الباتا اللي إنت لابسها إنها سينيه
مثّل علي الدنيا في عز الفقر إن إنت سعادة البيه
متخليش حد يقولك شايل طاجن ستك ليه
و بشوقك، عيش بشوقك
و دماغك إملاها علي ذوقك
و بشوقك، عيش بشوقك
وساعتها هيمشي سوقك
لما تطبل فوق راسك، اديها انت كمان تسقيف
وانشف كده و اصلب طولك، متبينش ان انت ضعيف
متاكلش الجبنة البيضة لو كان نفسك في البلوبيف
واصرف كل اللي في جيبك، دلع نفسك، عيش صرّيف
إحساسك قالك حاجة، امشي وراه، إحساسك صادق
ده السكر لون الملح، واحد حلو و واحد حادق
راحة البال اللي بجد، ليها اصول ليها مبادئ
لو ساكن فوق السطح اعتبره سويت في احلي فنادق
و بشوقك، عيش بشوقك
و دماغك إملاها علي ذوقك
و بشوقك، عيش بشوقك
وساعتها هيمشي سوقك
خد يابني مني الكلمة دي
اصرف ما في الجيب
اصرف ما في الجيب، وإشحت بكره عادي
و بشوقك، عيش بشوقك
و دماغك إملاها علي ذوقك

english.title: 3eesh besho2ak (عيش بشوقك) english translation
text: Live your passion
If the weight of important things is on you, if it overflowed you,
if you have any complaint, don't complain and listen to my advice
and if the world is destroying you
and forcing you to wash and iron clothes
just keep a happy face on
x2
and if you are so poor that you don't even have an Egyptian pound,
say that your shoes are the newest thing
act to the world in the middle of your poorness that you are happy
don't let anyone ask you why you're holding a woman's casserole
x3
your passion, live your passion
and fill your mind with what you want
your passion, live your passion,
and then your market will be what goes
when the world is drumming on your head, start clapping along
and if someone reaches your height don't show your weakness
don't eat cheese if you wanted bolobeef
and spend all the money in your pocket,
enjoy yourself, live as a spender.
if your feelings tell you something, follow it, your feelings are honest
sugar is the color of salt, but one is sweet and the other is salty
the true calmness of your mind has a path, has a start
if you're living on the concrete, imagine it a suite in the best hotel
x3
your passion, live your passion
and fill your mind with what you want
your passion, live your passion,
and then your market will be what goes
son, take my word on this
spend what's in your pocket
spend what's in your pocket, and clear tomorrow, that's fine.
x3
your passion, live your passion
and fill your mind with what you want

arabic.title: عين شمس
text: دي عيونك حلوة وطعمة
عليها ضحكة تدوب والنعمة
وانا خبرة في بنات الجمعة
دي يا تجارة يا أدب عين شمس
ولمحتك؟
قدام بيتي
وهتكلم؟
وياكي مشيتي
وعلى شانك
سبت انا عربيتي
وخدتها مشي رجعت فتاكس
يرضيكي يوماتي لبيتنا اخش
وافضل كدة ساكت ومتكلمش
واللي يكلمني ألبسلو الوش
وأمسكلو انا كدة عالوحدة
هتلفي هلف وراكي احترت
وان كان عالشغل منا تأخرت
وياريتني ما كنت بقا اتخرجت
وطلعت بتلاتين مادة
فاتت على عيني برقة
وضربات قلبي زادت كم دقة
وقالت مين كان قلك لأا
ازي مش عايزاك بالعكس
واتحول قلبي ساعتها
لعقرب فسواني ساعة إيدها
وقبل ما توصل رحت لبيتها
ووقلبي يدق كأنه كلكس
يرضيكي يوماتي لبيتتنا اخش

وأمسكلو انا كدة عالوحدة

وطلعت بتلاتين مادة

english.title: sun eye
text: your eyes are preety and flavoured,
she has a laugh that melt,
And I specialise in college girls,
this either bussines or literature  sun eye,
and I glimpsed you in front of my house,
I wanted to talked with you, you went away,
and for your sake I went left my car walked  and take a taxi,
I you happy for how I went into my home, then stay quit like this,not to talk,
And whoever talks to me I'll put on a stern face and  interrogate him,
go around around behind you hesitant,
if it about work,I'm late,
I wish I had graduated
and came out with thirty subjects,
she came into my eyes gently,
and hits my heart, an officers precision
and my heart changed then,
into a second dials in her hands watch,
and before she arrives I wenyt to her house,
with my heart beating as thought its a telex.

english.title: TAMER HOSNY new song 2010 3ein shams
text: The Eye of the Sun
English Translations

-Your eyes, are nice and flavorful. She has a smile that makes you melt, I swear. And I have experience with college girls. She's my neighbor and has eyes of the sun. And I saw a glance of you next to your house, I will talk to you, and I will walk with you. And for you I left my car, went walking, and came back in a taxi. (x2)

* Are you okay with the problems Im about to go through? And just stay quite and not talk, and who ever talks to me I will have an attitude with them, and be mad at them for nothing. I kept on following and following you, then I got confused. And if its for my work im already late. I wish I never graduated and left my country. (x2)

- She came into my eyes in a gentle way. And she hit my heart, and it started beating more. She said who could have told you "no"? How come I don't want you, it's the opposite. My heart changed in that moment, to a grabber, in the seconds her hands. And before she came I went to her house, and my heart was beating like a car horn. (x2)

* Are you okay with the problems Im about to go through? And just stay quite and not talk, and who ever talks to me I will have an attitude with them, and be mad at them for nothing. I kept on following and following you, then I got confused. And if its for my work im already late. I wish I never graduated and left my country. (x2)
- Your eyes....she has a smile....and I have experience...my neighbor and has eyes of the sun.
- Your eyes....smile smile smile...and I have experience...

- Your eyes, are nice and flavorful. She has a smile that makes you melt, I swear. And I have experience with college girls. She's my neighbor and has eyes of the sun. And I saw a glance of you next to your house, I will talk to you, and I will walk with you. And for you I left my car, went walking, and came back in a taxi. (x2)

arabic.title: عيونه دار
text: حبيبي يا كل الحياة
اوعدني انك تفضل معايا
ما تغبش عني خد قلبي مني
خليك حاضني لحد النهاية
دا عيونه دار
جنة ونار
ضحكة نهار
أجمل رموش
شدوني ليه
وأنا دوبت فيه
وازاي وليه ليه
ما تسألوش
الله عليك عليك وانت واقف بين ايديا
ضحكة عنيك بيها بنسى الدنيا ديا
الله الله عليك وانت واقف بين ايديا
ضحكة عنيك بيها بنسى الدنيا ديا
لو يوم يغيب
يلقى حبيب
يحلم معاه
آه ويحس بيه
هأفضل أنا أنا أنا
أحلم هنا
يجمعنا يوم
وأحضن عنيك
الله عليك عليك وانت واقف بين ايديا
ضحكة عنيك بيها بنسى الدنيا ديا ااااا

english.title: Allah 3aleik
text: my sweetheart u r all the life
promise me
to stay with me
not to be away
take my heart
keep huging me
till the end
his eyes r home
heaven and hell
a day's laughter
the most beautiful lashes
took me to him
and i've melted in him
how and why, don't ask
god bless u while u r standing between my hands
i forget this world by ur eyes' laughter
if he stay away for a day, he would find a lover
who would dream with him and feel him
i stay here dreaming
by a day that will brought us together to see his eyes

english.title: 3youno dar
text: My love , you all my life, promise me you'll saty with me
don't leave me..take my heart from me
keep embracing me till the end
her eyes are my home..my paradise and hell
a morning's laughter .. thr most beautiful lashes
attracted me to her..and I got melted for her
Why and how come you never ask?
how wonderful you are between my hands
I forget all the world by the laughter of your eyes
If she ever left ,, she'll find a lover to feel and dream with
I'll be staying .. here dreaming ,, a day will gather us and I embrace her eyes
how wonderful you are between my hands
I forget all the world by the laughter of your eyes

english.title: HER EYES ARE A HOME
text: My darling, my whole life
Promise me to stay with me
Don't leave me
Take my heart from me
May you embrace me until the very end
Her eyes are a home
A heaven and hell
Smile of day
The most beautiful eyelashes pulled me to you
And I fell in love with you
And how and why don't ask
God be with you when you are standing in my arms
Your eyes' smile makes me forget this world
If one day she left she would find a darling who dreams of her, ah, and feels for her
I will keep dreaming here until one day brings us together and I embrace your eyes

and thank you for treating me like that
it's taught me what pain really is

english.title: I had more than enough !
text: I'm not yet done of my speech.
I'm not going to let you ignore my words again.
Come here, talk, don't be absent-minded,
give me an end for my story and don't go away.
I bore more than what I can endure, Enough ! That's unfair !
No one can live such life of loss !
And who can endure such suffer ?
It's over, I had more than enough.
You showed that you're irresponsible.
Thanks for such treatment. Know I know how insult looks like !
Didn't you blame yourself even for once and tried to feel my pain ?
Even my tears, aren't they make any difference ?
Yes, break up is killing me.
But this is better for me and more suitable for you.
It's over, I had more than enough.
You showed that you're irresponsible.
Thanks for such treatment. Know I know how insult looks like !

arabic.title: فرق كبير
text: صباحكو فل يا رجالة
عطلت والإمتحان هيطير
أوصلكوا طيب
جدع وطيب
طب شدوا حيلكم وانشالله خير
دي مساعدتك تفرق كتير
من غير مناسبة كده بحبك
ومزاجي أنا أدلعك أهاديك
يا سيدي بختك
مين فينا قدك
حبيبي ليا أنا مين بعديك
دي كلمتك تفرق كتير
شوف إزاي حاجات بسيطة
تفرق إزاي ولو بسيطة
يمكن حاجة صغيرة تفرق عندهم أكتر
وقعت في الفخ يا ناصح
وعلينا بقا كل التظابيط
البدلة وصلت
والزفة جهزت
عقبالكوا بقا تلبسوا في الحيط
دي وقفتك تفرق كتير
آخر طبق مين كان عاوزه
من بدري وانتوا هنا واقفين
حلال عليك
تسلم عينيكي
بألف هنا ليكو يا حلوين
دي مجاملتك تفرق كتير
على بالي جيت قولت أما أسأل
إزيك انت واحشني كتير
يسلملي ذوقك
لازم أزورك
سؤالك أصله ده عندي كتير
دي مكالمتك تفرق كتير
أنا جيت أبارك وأهني
مولود جديد نور مبروك
قمر لمامته
طالع لخالته
اوعى يا واد تطلع لأبوك
دي مباركتك تفرق كتير

english.title: A Big difference
text: Good morning guys
It's broken and I'm going to be late for the exam
Shall I give you a ride
Good and generous
Ok be strong and inshallah ( hopefully) it's gonna be okay
It's that your help matters a lot
For nothing I love you
And I feel like spoiling you, giving you gifts
Your lucky
Which of us has your good luck
Love, I have no one else
It's that your word matters a lot
See how the small things, despite being simple, matter
Perhaps a small thing, makes a big difference to them
You fell into the trap, smarty
And we have to take care of everything
The suit is here
And the cars are ready
Hopefully for you all to fall into this trap
It's that your stand matters a lot
The last dish who wanted it?
You've been standing a long time
It's yours
Thanks a lot
Bon appetit to you beauties
It's that your complement matters a lot
I've been thinking of you so I came to see how you're doing
How are you, I missed you so much
Grateful for your gust
For sure I'll visit you
I really appreciate your asking
It's that your call matters a lot
I came to congratulate
A new baby has come, congratulations
So pretty like his mom
Looks like his aunt
Don't be like your dad
It's that your felicitation matters a lot

arabic.title: فى الحياة حاجات
text: فى الحياة حاجات مهمه
بس دائما فى الاهم
وانتى طول عمرك فى نظرى
كنت شايفك زى حلم
بس لما بدات اقرب
واعيش وياك واجرب
اكتشفت ان انت فعلا
شئ قليل مش مهم
عنيا وكانو شيفينك
بصورة تانية غير صورتك
حقيقة ما بينى وبينك
غلط فى يوم ما قدرتك
ده محدش حبه ومحدش
كرهة قدى
وانا من تعبى
لازم انساك
طول عمرى وانا تحت امره وهو ولا حس عمره
بدموع قلبى وانا وياه
واكتر حاجة بضحك
فى موضوعى ده كله معاك
عشان اوصل واكون وياك
خسرت الكل واخترتك

english.title: In Life
text: In Life there are important things but there's always what's more important and you were always something like a dream in my point of view
But when I started getting closer and lived with you and tried i found out that you really are little and not important
My eyes and they were seeing you in an different image than the real one
A truth between you and me i did a mistake the day i appreciated you
No one loved her like me and no one hated her like me
And from the pain I'm feeling i must forget you
I've always been under her command and she never felt The tears of my heart when I'm with her
The most funny thing in my whole situation with you,so I'd reach and be with you,i lost everyone and chose you

english.title: In Life
text: In life there are important things
But always the most important thing
And you've always been in my perspective
I had seen you as a dream
But when I started to come nearer
And live with you and try
I've discovered that you're truly
Something little not important
My eyes used to see you
In a picture different than yours
The truth between you and me
A mistake since the day I valued you
Nobody has loved this
Nor hated it as much as I did
And , I , from my tiredness
Should forget you
All my life , I've been under her command , and she's never felt
The tears of my heart when I was with her
And the funniest thing
About this , is that with you
So that I can reach and be with you
I've lost everyone and chose you

arabic.title: قابلتيني
text: ياه كان فيه واحد
ولا فارق معاه
عايش حياته بين هنا وهناك
ولا حد شاغل قلبه لا
اااااه اااااه
مين حالا هقولك
هو يبقى مين
بينك وبينه يجى خطوتين
ونفسه يقولك كلمتين

رد السؤال ده هتعرفيه
لو حضني تيجى ثانيه فيه
اااااه اااااه

english.title: You Met me
text: Once upon a time, there used to be a guy
who didn't care about anything
He was living his life here and there
And nobody occupied his heart, no
Oh, oh
Who is he? I will tell you right now
who he is
There are two steps or so between you and him
And he wants to tell you a word or two
Oh, oh, you met me
Why did you change how I see everything?
Oh your love has done so much to me
And still will do so much
Why did I live my life for you?
You will know the answer to that question
If you come and embrace me for a second
Oh, oh
There used to be a spot in my heart
that was saved for you since long ago
You've finally taken it; it's time now!

arabic.title: قرب حبيبي
text: قرب حبيبي قرب تعالى
ليه سايبنى في نار يا حبيبي
ليه سايبنى في نار
انت اللي في قلبي ولا غيري في قلبك

يبقا ليه نحتار

english.title: Come Closer My Love
text: come closer my love, come here
why do you leave me on fire my love?
why do you leave me on fire?
come closer my love, come here
why do you leave me on fire my love?
why do you leave me on fire?
you're the one in my heart, and there isn't anyone but me in your heart
then why are we confused my love?
then why are we confused?
you'll hide and I'll hide and you'll light my fire and yours
and you'd die to know what's ging on with me
and I'd die of yearning and confusion
get closer and I'll get closer too
what would happen if we even try?
who knows, if you get closer
we might get rid of these thoughts
you'd act like you forgot me, you'd act like you left me
if you try to go away from me
it'll be only for one night
and then you'll come back to me, needing my kindness
what's between us, my life
is very hard to give up
you'll hide and I'll hide and you'll light my fire and yours
and you'd die to know what's ging on with me
and I'd die of yearning and confusion
get closer and I'll get closer too
what would happen if we even try?
who knows, if you get closer
we might get rid of these thoughts
(sarcastically) as if my love can leave me
(sarcastically) as if she can leave men and I'd let her
even if they took an eye of mine
I'd go again and get her back
(sarcastically) as if my love can leave me
(sarcastically) as if she can leave men and I'd let her

arabic.title: قرب كمان
text: وانا جمبك حبيبي بجد مش عارف اقولك ايه
معاك الوقت بيعدي ماحسش بيه
واي كلام هايوصف اية فلحظة بعيشها وانا وياك
كفاية عليا تبقى فحضني وابقى معاك
قرب كمان من حضني وحس باللي بحس بيه
دانا من زمان مستني اعيش وياك اللحظة دي
يا حبيبي قول بحبك وانا اقولها معاك---
حبيبي يفوت سنين وايام على حبك فقلبي يزيد
كأني بعيش من الاول فحب جديد
بعدت كتير وحضنك عنه مهما بعدت برجع ليه
وقلبي يدوب فأحساسه اللى عايش فيه
قرب كمان من حضني وحس باللي بحس بيه
دانا من زمان مستني اعيش وياك اللحظة دي
يا حبيبي قول بحبك وانا اقولها معاك

english.title: Come closer
text: When i'm beside you, i realy don't know what to say
With you the time goes by so fast , i don't feel it
And what words can express the moment I live with you
It's enough for me to be in my lap and be with you
Come closer to my lap and feel what i feel
I've been waiting to live  this moment with you
My love, say i love you and i say it with you
My love, years and days pass and your love increases in my heart
As if i'm living a new love from the beginning
You are far away and how far away i go from your lap i come back to it
And my heart enjoys with the feelings it lives with
Come closer to my lap and feel what i feel
I've been waiting to live with you this moment
My love say i love you and i say it with you

english.title: Come Closer
text: When I'm next to you baby I don't know what to say
When I'm with you time flies
No words can describe what I feel when I'm near you
It's enough for you to be in my arms and to be with you
Come closer into my arms and feel what I am feeling
For so long I have waited to live in this moment with you
Baby say I love you and I will say it too
Come closer into my arms and feel what I am feeling
I've waited to live this moment, baby, say I love you and I will say it too

arabic.title: قسمة ونصيب
text: أيوه كل واحد فينا راح وعاش حب جديد
بس لسة الخير مالينا وكل شئ قسمه و نصيب
أيوه كل واحد فينا راح وعاش حب جديد
بس لسه الخير مالينا وكل شئ قسمه و نصيب
ياريت اللى يشوفها يسألها عامله إيه
وياريت يطمن خوفها مش هاقول كان بينا إيه
ياريت اللى يشوفها يسألها عامله إيه
وياريت يطمن خوفها مش هاقول كان بينا إيه
وقولولها اللى كان بينا ميخليهاش تشوفنى تبص بعيد
أى واحدة ممكن تضعف قدام حبيبها ده شي أكيد
وانا أكتر واحد عارف من جواها ملاك قلبه رقيق
واللى كان بينا فعينيا ذكريات إحساس بريء
حتى أنا أيوه انا اللي بعدك حبيتها
ولو انا فى حبها مش أول حب فى حياتها
أهى دايرة وبتدور علينا علينا كلنا
ماحنا خدنا حاجات كتير ماكانيتش أصلاً حقنا
ياريت اللى يشوفها يسألها عامله إيه
وياريت يطمن خوفها مش هاقول كان بينا إيه

english.title: Destiny and Fate
text: Yes, all of us have gone and loved someone new
But still the good times fill us and everything is destiny and fate
If anyone sees her ask her how she is doing
And put her at ease that I won't say what was between us
Let her know that what we had won't let her see me, to look away
It's possible for any girl to be weak in front of her ex-lover passing by
And I am the only one who knows most that inside her is a sweet angel
What was between us is in my eyes, innocent memories
Even for me after I loved someone new
Although her love wasn't the first in my life
It's still going and keeps going.. and goes on for all of us
We've taken so much that wasn't from our right to take
If anyone sees her ask her how she is doing
And put her at ease that I won't say what was between us

arabic.title: قفلت قلبي
text: انا لو عنيا تشوف غيرك
انا مش هفتحها
واى كلمة حلوة مش منك
مش هسمعها
قفلت قلبى عليكى خلاص
وكتبت عليه اااه اسمك
دمعتي ليه ده انا اموت نفسى
ومشفش دمعة اه منك
انا لو اطول افرشلك
قلبى تمشى عليه
لان اتخلقت علشان
احقق كل اللى بتحلمى بيه
قفلت قلبى عليكى خلاص
وكتبت عليه اااه اسمك
دمعتي ليه ده انا اموت نفسى
ومشفش دمعة اه منك
قفلت قلبي عليكي خلاص
و مشفش دمعة ااااه منك

english.title: I locked my heart
text: If my eyes see someone else
I won't open it
And any beautiful word not from you
I won't hear it
I locked my heart on you
And i wrote your name on it
Why you cried , i kill myself just not to see your tears
If i only can put down my heart for you to walk on it
Because i'm created to make your dreams come true
I locked my heart on you
And i wrote your name on it
Why you cried , i kill myself just not to see your tears
I locked my heart on you
And not to see your tears

arabic.title: قلبي اللي حبك
text: قلبى اللى حبك بطل يحبك
بطل يسلم بطل يتكلم بطل يقول بهواك
لما انته مش قد الغرام بتقول بحبك ليه
لما انته مش قد الكلام عايز من قلبى ايه
كنت عايش حياتى عشانك
وياما حاولو ياما يخدوا مكانك
قولى امتى حبتنى انته كده لما عمرك محستنيش
كل مره بستحمل جرحك
واجى على نفسى وانا اللى بصالحك
ولا بتقدر وبتستهتر بمشاعرى وكل حنينى

english.title: My Heart That Loved You
text: My heart that loved you stopped loving you
Stopped saying hello.. stopped speaking
Stopped saying he loves you
If you're not as strong as love then why do you say you love
If you're not as strong as your word.. what do you want with my heart?
I lived my life for you.. and so many have tried to take your place
Tell me when have you loved me.. when if you have never felt for me
Every time I endured your pain.. and I let go of my pride and apologize
And you can't and ?btsthtr? (sorry I don't know this word, it may be wrong, but I haven't listened to his song) with my feelings and all of my tenderness
From this day on I will live my life
And I will forget and learn from my mistakes
Does it deserve, I swear nothing deserves.
For me to stay living in my wounds
I don't understand why I stayed with you.. I don't see anything special in you
To keep my heart like this.. ohh my heart is hung up on you and has not seen rest

arabic.title: قولي بحبك
text: في يوم زي ده في ليله زي دي حبيبي بيبقا معايا والآه بتتنسى
حبيبي كل يوم بيفوت بحس كانى من غيرك اموت
حبيبي كل يوم بيفوت بحس بانى محتاجلك موت
حبيبي كل يوم بيفوت بحس كانى من غيرك اموت
حبيبي كل يوم بيفوت بحس بانى محتاجلك موووووت

حبيبي متسيبنيش اعيش ولا ثانيه بعيد عن حضنك انت حياتى
حبيبي متسيبنيش اعيش ولا ثانيه بعيد عن حضنك انت حياتى

english.title: Tell Me I Love You
text: On a day like this one, in a night like this one
my love used to be with me, and the pain would be forgotten
my love, everyday that passes by, I feel
like without you I could die
my love, everyday that passes by, I feel
that I need you to death
tell me I love you in a loud voice
tell me I love you, my percious love
my love don't leave me live
even a second aways from your hug
you are my love
tell me I love you in a loud voice
tell me I love you, my percious love

arabic.title: قوم أقف
text: عشان اصالحك وارضى عليك حاجات كتير لازم تعملها وعشان اسامحك وارضى عليك
حاجات كتير ودي اولها
قوم اقف وانت بتكلمني قوم اقف بصلي وفهمني
ولا تتكلم وانا بتكلم وانت غلطت ابقى امشي وسيبني
قوم اقف وانت بتكلمني قوم اقف بصلي وفهمني
انت ليه اه ليه اه ليه اااااه
انت ليه ما بتحبش تسمع انك غلطان
قولي ليه اه ليه اه ليه اااااه
قولي ليه ولا حتى بتسال وكمان زعلان
لو نسيوا يعلموك او حتى يفهموك
الي فاتك من حياتك حعلمهولك
قوم اقف وانت بتكلمني قوم اقف بصلي وفهمني

english.title: Om Oaaf
text: to forgive you there are many things you must do
alot of things and this is the first
stand up while u r talking to me.stand up and look at me and expalin to me
and dont talk while im talking and if im wrong go and leave me
stand up while u r talking to me.stand up and look at me and expalin to me
why are u.....?
why u dont like to hear that u r wrong?
tell me why?
tell me why arent u asking and u r angry?
if they forgot to teach u or even to make u undersatnd
what has passed u from ur life i'll teach it to u
stand up while u r talking to me.stand up and look at me and expalin to me

arabic.title: كان في واحدة
text: كان في واحدة حياتها عادية وكان نفسها تتحب
قابلت واحد كل كلامه معاها دخل القلب
فضلت طول الليل سهرانة تفكر في كلامه
من جواها كانت فرحانة وشاغلها سلامه
خد قلبها وبقى يروحلها قدام باب بيتها
حست ان الحب ندالها ودخل دنيتها
و ف مرة بحنية قابلها وقرب لإيديها
و طلع دبله ورق لبستها وفرحت اوي بيها
ووعدها انها هتشاركه حياته وانه هيحميها
حلفتله هتستناه و هتفضل دبلته ف ايديها
كان هوّا بالنسبالها حياتها ودنيا بتبنيها
ومكانش ف بالها انه ف احساسها ممكن يأذيها
كان في واحدة حياتها عادية وكان نفسها تتحب
ضاع من عمرها أحلى سنين مع واحد عمره ما حب
حست انها ظلمت نفسها و ده أثر فيها
ولما بقت ملكه مَلّها و استهون بيها
فهمت وقتها انه لا حبها ولا قلبه عليها
وانه محسش يوم بقيمتها ولا هيكون ليها
و ان الدنيا اللي رسمهالها مش موجود فيها
وفعلاً دبلة ورق نهايتها بننسى ونرميها

english.title: There was a girl
text: There was a girl whose life was normal and she wished to be loved
She met a guy whose words touched her heart
She spent all night awake thinking about his words
She was so happy and cared for his safety
He stole her heart and used to go to her doorstep
She felt that love called her and entered her world
One time he met her and touched her hands gently
And gave her a paper ring that she wore and was so happy
Her promised to protect and share his life with her
She swore to wait for him and keep wearing his ring
He was everthing to her,a life she was trying to build
She never thought he would hurt her
There was a girl whose life was normal and she wished to be loved
She wasted the best years of her life with someone who never loved
She felt that she was not fair to herself and that affected her
Once he had her he got bored and did not even care
At that time she knew he had never loved her
Neither had he valued her,he would never be for her
She would never live in the world he had told her about
The paper ring was then forgotten and thrown away

arabic.title: كداب واناني
text: كداب واناني وايه تاني؟
كملي قولي ومتخبيش
وريني انتي ازاي شايفاني
طلعي كل اللي ف قلبك متتكسفيش!
انتي الصح تملي ودايماً فوق الكل
كاملة وزيك في الدنيا دي مشوفتش حد
انتي عظيمة ومفيكيش غلطة وزي الفل
وانا أسوأ واحد موجود على وش الأرض
انا مش عايز أرد عليكي الجرح بجرح
عدي عيوبي بكل ذنوبي اتكلمي فيها
لو هتكلم ممكن اقول عنك للصبح
ويمكن أواجهك بحاجات عمرك ما هتنسيها
انتي الصح تملي ودايماً فوق الكل
كاملة وزيك في الدنيا دي مشوفتش حد
انتي عظيمة ومفيكيش غلطة وزي الفل
وانا أسوأ واحد موجود على وش الأرض
كداب واناني وايه تاني؟
كملي قولي ومتخبيش
وريني انتي ازاي شايفاني
طلعي كل اللي ف قلبك متتكسفيش!

english.title: Liar and selfish
text: Liar and selfish ,what else?
Go on and tell everything ...
Tell me how you see me.
Tell me all that you think
You are always right,and always above all people
You are perfect and nobody is like you in the whole world
You are great ,flawless,and perfect
And me,I'm the worst person on the earth
I don't want to hurt you as hurt me
count my flaws and my sins and talk about them
If I'm going to talk ,I have a lot to say about you
I can face you with things that you will never forget!
You are always right,and always above all people
You are perfect and nobody is like you in the whole world
You are great ,flawless,and perfect
And me,I'm the worst person on the earth
Liar and selfish ,what else?
Go on and tell everything ...
Tell me how you see me.
Tell me all that you think

arabic.title: كفياك أعذار
text: لو فعلا بتهمك راحتي زي ما بتقول
كان المفروض لما تشوفني تفهم على طول
انك طول ما انت بعيد عني
العمر بيجري و يسرقني و وجعي بيطول
كفاياك اعذار
و لآخر مرة هقولهالك
كفاياك اعذار
مش دايما هنسي و هصفالك
علي الوضع ده لا
الجاي مش خير
و لو هطول
نهايتنا خليها في بالك
هتيجي في يوم
هتلاقي نتيجة اهمالك
عايشها وحيد
و الجرح كبير
دايما مشغول بحاجات غيري
و لا ليا وجود
وسمعت انا ياما كلام منك
و شبعت وعود
و ده دايما طبعك و ده حالك
حتي الاحساس بالنسبالك
حمل و مجهود

english.title: No more excuses
text: If you really care about me as you say
You should have understood what I need once you saw me
That as long as you are far from me
My life is lost and I'm in agony
No more excuses
And for the last time, I will tell you that you have
No more excuses
I won't always forget and forgive you
According to our current situation...
Our relationship future is not auspicious
If you stay like this..
Keep in your mind the end of our relationship soon
You'll one day
Reap what you sow
You will find yourself alone
With a great wound
Always busy with the needs of others
And I don't have a presence
I heard so much talk from you
And so many promises
This is what you are
You don't almost have any feelings
And you consider it load and effort

english.title: Enough with your excuses
text: if my comfort really matters to you like you say
you were supposed to immediately understand when you see me
that as long you're away from me
life is stealing me away and my pain lingers
enough with your excuses
and I will tell you for the last time
enough with your excuses
I won't forget and reconcile with you forever
as it stands now, no
what's coming is not good
and if I stay longer
keep our end in mind
one day you'll come back
and find the outcome of your neglect
I'm living it alone
and the wound is large
you're always busy with other things
and I don't exist
and I've heard too many things from you
and I'm fed up with promises
and this is always how you are and this is your condition
even feelings are
a burden and an effort to you

arabic.title: كل حاجة بيننا
text: من يوم شمسه ما غابت عني
عيني ما شافت نوم
بمشي وبرجع نفس مكاني
مهما بلف وأدور
احساس بالعجز بيخنقني
متكتف مسجون
زي الطير اللي بيتمنى
يطير بجناح مكسور
كل حاجة بينا لسه بتفكرني بيه
ضحكته اللي فوق شفايفه وسلام ايديه
فاكر الكلام اللي قولته ليه
والشوق في عنيه
آه مش عارف اعيش من بعده
انا مش عارف اموت
والناس حواليا بتتكلم
وانا مش سامع صوت
زي ما اكون تمثال من شمع
تشوفه تقول انسان
ممكن تبقى ملامحه بتضحك
ومن جواه بيموت تعبان
كل حاجة بينا لسه بتفكرني بيه
ضحكته اللي فوق شفايفه وسلام ايديه
فاكر الكلام اللي قولته ليه
والشوق في عنيه

english.title: Kol haga bena (English translation)
text: From the day your bright presence and sunshine left me, my eyes saw no light
I walk and return to my original place, no matter how I turn and wander
My Feelings are choking me, I feel constrained and oppressed, like a bird who wishes to fly with broken wings
All the memories of us reminds me of you,
Your smile that curves upon your cheeks
And the safety of your hands and embrace
I remember the words you said to me and the love in your eyes (x2)
I don't know how to live without (her)
I don't know how to die
And everyone around me speaks but I hear not a single voice
Like a candle, shedding its shadow showing (her)
Like his resemblance laughing and smiling but inside (she's) tired
Everything between us still reminds me of you
Your laugh that curves upon your cheeks
And the warm greeting of your embrace and greeting
I remember the words I told you and the love in your eyesight  (x2)

english.title: Everything Between Us
text: Since the day her sun left me (became in the state of absence)
My eyes haven't seen sleep (Haven't slept)
I keep walking, returning to my initial spot
No matter how long I keep walking and strolling around
Feeling of inability strangles me
Tightened, Captivated (I'm)
Like the bird who wishes
To fly with a broken wing
Everything between us still reminds me of her
Her laugh above her lips, and the greeting of her hands
I still remember the words I've said to her
And the love in her eyes
Oh, I can't find a way to live after her
I can't find a way to die
People around are gossiping
And I can't hear a/the voice
Just as if I'm a wax sculpture of a man
You would say "A human" once you see it
His lineaments might be funny
But inside he'll be dying, of tiredness (sorrow)
Everything between us still reminds me of her
Her laugh above her lips, and the greeting of her hands
I still remember the words I've said to her
And the love in her eyes

arabic.title: كل ده علي ايه
text: اسمع منى يا قلبى حبيبنا وسابنا
وبيرتاح فى عذابنا دمر كل حياتى وليه الفضل
مش معقول الى انتا بتعمله فيا
فكر فيا شويا انا مش طالب منك غير العدل
وليه كل دا على ايه
هو يعنى خلاص مفيش فى الدنيا دى بعديه
وليه لسه باقى عليه
يعنى كدا يرضيك يا قلبى الى احنا عايشيين فيه
سابنى يا قلبى وقلت مسيرك تنسى
ومع الوقت هتقسى
وهنقفل صفحته انا وانتا خلاص
من يوم بعدة وسايبك تيجى عليا
ملعونة الحنية
والحب اللى يقلل قيمة الناس

english.title: What's All This About?
text: Listen to me, my heart.
She was our love and she left us.
And she takes pleasure in our pain.
My life was ruined and she's to blame.
It's unbelievable what you're doing to me.
Think of me a bit.
I'm not asking anything of you other than fairness.
And why?
What's all this about?
It's not like the world ended after she left.
And why are you still hung up on her?
Does this mean that you're okay, my heart, with the way we're living now?
She left us, my heart, and I said you'd finally get over her.
And with time, you'd toughen up.
And we'll close that page.
And from the day she left us, I left you to do whatever you wanted to me.
Damn tenderness.
And the love that reduces the value of people.

english.title: What's all that for?
text: Listen my heart, our beloved dumped us
And she loves seeing us suffer
She ruined my life, thanks to her!
Think about me a bit (my heart)
I don't want anything from you but being fair!
What's all that for??
Why are you acting like the world is over!
And why do you still love her?
Are you satisfied with the way we suffer now?
Oh heart she left you, and I said you'll finally get over her
(And) that time would let you become tough
(And) that we'll start a new page
Since she left I made you do what you want
Damn this tenderness (of mine)
Damn this love that humiliates people

text: مستنى اليوم اللى ارجع فيه مش قادر اعيش ولا يوم بعديه من يوم ما بعدنا مفيش من بعده امل
انا نفسى اقولك بس سؤال هو انت بعيد مرتاح البال ولا انت حبيبى البعد خلاص قساك

english.title: I'm waiting for the day
text: I'm waiting for the day... I'm waiting for the day... that I will return. I can't live any day after that. From the day we separated there hasn't been any hope since then... I really want to tell you a question- Are you fine with being away from me? or has being away made you harsh?

I'm waiting for the day... I'm waiting for the day... that I will return. I can't live any day after that. From the day we separated there hasn't been any hope since then... I really want to tell you a question- Are you fine with being away from me? or has being away made you harsh?
Oh baby years, and we've been lost for long. Take me bad so I can finish my life with you.  I will live and die and no second will pass unless you are present in my mind and I be with you.
Oh baby years, and we've been lost for long. Take me bad so I can finish my life with you.  I will live and die and no second will pass unless you are present in my mind and I be with you.
Come let's live again, don't leave me, baby, alone.. Come here and don't distance me from your lap.
Every day I dream of you in my lap, there are a lot of things that I miss, don't deprive me of them...
Come let's live again, don't leave me, baby, alone.. Come here and don't distance me from your lap.
Every day I dream of you in my lap, there are a lot of things that I miss, don't deprive me of them...

arabic.title: لو خايفة
text: لو خايفة أضمك تلاقي الامان
لو تايهة في قلبي تلاقي الحنان
اه اجيلك لو انتى في أبعد مكان
لو خايفة اضمك تلاقي الامان
حبيتك وفي بعدك قلبي معاك
حبيتك مش ممكن انسى هواك
اجيلك لو انتى في ابعد مكان
لو خايفه اضمك تلاقي الامان
انا حاسس كأنى قابلتك زمان
انا عايز اقولك بحبك كمان
قوليلي حجيلك أنور سماك
حكايتنا حكاية كتبها ملاك
انا جمبك وحياتى مكان ما تكون
وملكتك خلتنى ملكت الكون
اجيلك لو انتى في ابعد مكان
لو خايفة أضمك تلاقي الامان

arabic.title: مابنساش
text: مبنساش اللى كان بينا ولا بنساك
ومش قادر بتوحشني سنيني معاك
واقول لو تيجي من تاني بينا الايام
انا هبقى تمام ومش هنساه

و لا الغلطه هتتصلح ولا هرتاح
ما انا استاهل مفكرتش وسبته يضيع
واديني بضيع من بعد ما راح
ده غلطي ولازم اتحمل و ده الاصعب
مكننتش سبته من الاول مادام هتعب
مفيش فايده خلاص بينا في باب مقفول
ومش معقول عليه هاصعب

ما كنت اعدي واسامح هيحصل ايه
قراري اخدته وانا عارف مفيش فيه رجوع
هعيش موجوع في ايدي انا ايه
مخفتش قبل ما اتهور واسيبه انا ليه
مكنتش اصلي اتصور اموت بعديه
مسبتش حتى ليه بينا في باب مفتوح
وسبته يروح طب اندم ليه
ده غلطي ولازم اتحمل و ده الاصعب
مكننتش سبته من الاول مادام هتعب

english.title: I Can't Forget
text: I can't forget what was between us, and I can't forget you
I can't help it, I miss my years with you
I say; if days would bring us back
I would be fine, and I wouldn't forget him
I have made a mistake and my punishment is to live in pain
Neither will the mistake repair, nor will I be relieved
Because I deserve this, I didn't think, and I lost him
And here I am getting lost, after he's gone
This is my mistake and thus I shall endure, that's the hardest part
I shouldn't have left him to start with if I would be this hurt
There's no use, there's a closed door between us already
And it is not possible he would feel pity for me
If only I could have been more compassionate, and gotten closer to him
I could have let things pass and forgive what would've happened?
I have taken my choice knowing there is no going back
I will live in pain without having anything in hand to be done

I actually didn't know I'd die after him

I let him go, then why do I regret it??
This is my mistake and thus I shall endure, that's the hardest part
I shouldn't have left him to start with if I would be this hurt
There's no use, there's a closed door between us already

arabic.title: مجنون انا
text: وهو جنبي بنتخانق كتير اوي مابطيقش نفسي

وبتهون عليا العشره واقول طيب وماله
انا اقدر على بعده
ف هو يبعد
تنزل دموعي والوم ف نفسي ليه قولت يبعد
وارجع ف كل قرار اخدته من ناحيته

ولا بقدر ع بعده
ودا يطلع ايه
كل اللي فيه دلوقتي انا طب اعمل ايه
احساس وعكسه بحسه انا
انا مش قادر ولا يوم اكمل معاه
ولا اعيش من غير هواه ده اكيد مجنون انا
يغير عليا اقول ف سري يادي بقى الخنقه ديا
واروح اشوف حد اشتكيله م اللي حواليا
يهملني هو وارجع واموت م الحركه ديا
واسأل ف نفسي ليه هو مش مهتم بيا
واقعد واقول انا نفسي حد يغير عليا
انا اتاكدت ان اللي انا فيه ده مشكله فيا
انا اللي مش عارف عايز ايه والعيب عليا
انا استاهل الحيرة دي
ودا يطلع ايه طب اعمل ايه
احساس وعكسه بحسه انا
انا مش قادر ولا يوم اكمل معاه

english.title: I'm crazy
text: When she is by my side we fight too much
It makes me hate myself
And want to break up with her
and I wouldn't care about the time we spent together and say it's okay
I could stay away from her
Then she goes away
I burst into tears and blame myself, why did I tell her to go away
And I cancel every decision I made concerning her
Suddenly I find myself needing her hug, her kindness
And I can't stand her awayness
So what on Earth is this
All that I'm in now, then what do I do?
I am having a feeling and its opposite
I can't spend one more day with her
Nor live without her love,
Hence I'm crazy for sure
When she is being jealous, I say: oh what a prison I'm in
And I look for someone to complain to
She neglects me and I feel like dyeing from it
And I ask myself why doesn't she care about me
And I keep telling myself that I need someone to be jealous while we are together
Now I'm sure that it's me who has a problem
I'm the one who doesn't know what he wants and so shame on me
I deserve this confusion
So what on Earth is this, so what do I do?
I am having a feeling and its opposite
I can't spend one more day with her
Nor live without her love,
I'm crazy
Craaazy

english.title: Why Have You Forgotten me?
text: I can't stay away from you for a second
If you were gone, there'd be no one for me
You are the first love my heart lived with
The days are no longer the same
I wish you'd come back, my eyes miss you
In your absence, my life isn't even a life
Why have you forgotten me?
You are making my heart grow weary
I would never just lightly and easily
forget you
Come blame me
Set your heart at peace and find peace
Come here, I wish to
find peace in your embrace
I cannot live waiting
I can't control this at all
I miss you, my darling
Tell me, what can I do?
You didn't see anything that happened to me
And I hear many people telling me:
By now she'll have forgotten you and is living
Why would you remember her?

text: I still have the same yearning and remembering our beautiful memories,while holding your picture everyday

بحبك لو هقولهالك بقيت آيامي متكفيش
سنين بحلم تكون جنبي قصاد عيني ومتسبنيش
ياريت ينفع أعيش عمرين في حضنك عمر مايقضيش
لقيت فيك اللي بحلم بيه وطول الوقت مستنيه
انا شايفك معايا خلاص حبيبي يبقى ناقص ايه
يا أول حب طمني وخدني من الحياة والناس
بقربك تحلى أيامي بحس معاك ب 100 احساس
ولو جه حد يسأل ليه هقوله انا قلبي حب خلاص
عرفت الحب بيك ومعاك بعيش الجنة وانا وياك
دانا انسى الدنيا دي عادي ومش ممكن حبيبي انساك
ومين يقدر بقى يلومني انا شايفك قصادي ملاك
لقيت فيك اللي بحلم بيه وطول الوقت مستنيه
انا شايفك معايا خلاص حبيبي يبقى ناقص ايه

english.title: I'll Tell You A Word
text: I'll tell you a word, believe me there's no one before or after you
And I don't need this life and it can't be lived a day, if not for you
And if my life would pass (run) out, it's worth nothing for you sake
I love you, It won't be enough even if I spent all my days saying it to you
I've been dreaming for years that you're in front of my very eyes and not leaving me
I wish if I could live two lives in your arms, as one wouldn't be enough
I've found what I've dreamed of and been waiting for all this time in you
It's over I'm seeing you with you. Darling, what's left?
Oh, (you're) the first love that assured me, and took me from life and people
My life will sweeten with you, I'm feeling a hundred feelings with you
And if someone approached me asking why? I'll tell them my heart had fell in love and that's it!
I've knew love in and with you, I'm living paradise when I'm with you
I can forget about this world, that's easy. but it's not possible I forget you
And who came blame me afterwards? I'm seeing you in front of me as an angel.
I've found what I've dreamed of and been waiting for all this time in you
It's over I'm seeing you with you. Darling, what's left?

arabic.title: هموت وارجع
text: هموت وارجع وكل ما اقول وايه يمنع
اخاااف اسمع كلمة خلااااااص
مبقاش ينفع .. ينفع
هموت وارجع وكل ما اقول وايه يمنع
اخاااف اسمع كلمة خلااااااص
مبقاش ينفع .. ينفع
حاجات جوايا تعباني ومش بنسي .....وحشاااني
اه من البعاد لما بيوجع اه
وكتييير من نفسي انا بهرب
ونفسي لو اجرب
احساسي بيقولي من بعض هنقرب وهنبقي تاني لبعض
وكتييير من نفسي انا بهرب
ونفسي لو اجرب
احساسي بيقولي من بعض هنقرب وهنبقي تاني لبعض
ياريت يا زماني لو ترجع بينا تاني
نفسي يوووم اشوف حبيبي في احضاني
طب ازاي انسي ده سايبلي في كل مكان
ذكري حلوة متتنسيش كانت ما بينا مع بعض زمان

english.title: I'll die and get back
text: I'll die and get back, every time I say "What's stopping us?"
I'm afraid to hear the words: "It's over".
It's not possible anymore, not possible...
I'll die and get back, every time I say "What's stopping us?"
I'm afraid to hear the words: "It's over".
It's not possible anymore, not possible...
There are things inside of me that wear me out
I miss you,
Oh, this distance is so painful
I try to escape from myself so bad
And I wish to attempt it,
My feelings are telling me that we'll get closer and we'll belong to each other again.
I try to escape from myself so bad
And I wish to attempt it,
My feelings are telling me that we'll get closer and we'll belong to each other again.
I wish the past would be ours again
I long to hold my lover between my arms
How can I forget, when she has left me unforgettable, sweet memories everywhere of her and I in the past?

arabic.title: هوصلك
text: أنا مش هخاف المرادي
ضاع من عمري سنين في الخوف
مش هكون إنسان عادي
أنا هتحدى أي ظروف
هوصلك حتى لو عارف
إني ممكن أموت
هوصلك ولازم تحسي
باللي حبك موت
ولو إيديكى مالمستش إيديا
كفاية عليا أموت وانا شايف
لهفتك عليا

english.title: I Will Reach You
text: I won't get scared this time
I've lost years of my life to fear
I won't be just an ordinary person
I will challenge any circumstances
I will reach you even though I know
that I might die
I will reach you and you must feel
the one who loved you to death
And even if your hands don't touch mine
It's enough for me to die seeing
your fear and love for me.

english.title: Hawsal leek
text: I won't be afraid this time
Years of my life lost in fear
I won't be a normal person
I will stand any problem
I'll come to you even if I know I could die
I'll come to you and you have to feel with the one who loves you a lot
And if your hand wont touch mine
It's okay for me if I die seeing
your love for me

english.title: I'll Reach You
text: I won't be afraid this time
I've lost many years in fear
I won't be a normal human
I'll challenge any circumstances
I'll reach you, even if I know that I could die
I'll reach you and you must feel the one who loved you to death
and if your hands didn't youch mine
then it's enough for me to die seeing
your rush for me

arabic.title: و أخيراً
text: وأخيراً جه اليوم
أبقى معاك
شوف كام سنة باستناك
ولا مرة تعبت
وقولت ده حب خيال
اتفرج بقى هاعملك إيه
أنا قلبي حافظت عليه
أوصفلك إيه
مش لاقي كلام يتقال
هنحب حب
عمر قلب حد ما حس بيه
هتحكي الناس عليه
هيقولوا شوفوا
حبوا بعض قد إيه
اتمنى نجوم السما تتجاب
هى الفرصة دي تتساب
حبيت الدنيا معاك
من أول يوم
هاسهرلك بدل الليلة سنين
مش محتاج ناس تانيين
مين يقدر يسمع صوتك
ويجيله نوم؟

english.title: And Finally
text: And finally the day has come
for me to be with her
I have been waiting for many years
And I never grew tired
nor said this love is an illusion
Now watch what I'll do for you
You've kept my heart intact
How can I describe it all to you?
I can't find any words to say
We will love each other, a love
that no heart has ever felt
People will tell tales of it
They will say: look
how much they love each other
Wish for the stars, I'll get them
I won't let this chance go to waste
With you, I've fallen in love with life
from the first day
I will stay up years for you, not just for a night
I don't need anyone else
Who could ever hear your voice
and even find sleep?

arabic.title: وأنا عيني في عينك
text: نفسي تفضل معايا في حضني .. من شوقي لهوايا تاخدني وابقي كل الحياة يا حبيبي ليك
نفسي أقولك بكل ما فيا .. إنت بس اللي غالي عليا سيبني أحلم واعيش وانا بين إيديك
ليلة وانت معايا .. بعمري كله ودا كان منايا .. معاك هعيش أجمل حكاية .. وأحس بيك ..
هنسي وياك سنيني .. واخبي قلبك جوه عيني .. ياللي ناداك شوقي وحنيني وروحي فيك ..
وأنا عيني في عينك بسأل زمان طب كان فينك .. أحلي غرام بيني وبينك واجمل هوا
خليني في قلبك دا انا دبت فيك .. أيوة بحبك .. سيبببني حبيبي اعيش جنبك .. ونكون سوا
وأنا عيني في عينك بسأل زمان طب كان فينك .. أحلي غرام بيني وبينك واجمل هوا
خليني في قلبك دا انا دبت فيك .. أيوة بحبك .. سيبببني حبيبي اعيش جنبك .. ونكون سوا

english.title: my eye in your eye
text: i wish you stay with me between my arms with your love take me away and start my life just for you
i wish i can tell you what's in me. your the one for me .
let me dream between your arms
one night your with me my all my life was to saty one night with you
with you i will live the best stroy off love
with you i will forget my years and hide your heart in my eyes
when my eye in your eyes i ask my slef where were you for before why did you take long time to be in my life
leave me in your heart i melt with you and yes i do love you
leave me let me life my rest off my life beside you
and you stay togther
when my eyes in your eyes i ask my slef where were you before where were you for so long
leave me in your heart i melt with you and yes i do love you

english.title: Wana 3eeny fe 3enak
text: I want you to stay in my arms,
to take my longings away from me,
and to be everything to you, my sweetheart.
I want to tell you with everything within me,
you're the only one who's dear to me,
let me dream and live between your arms.
At night when you're with me,
was my wish for my whole life,
with you, I'll live the most precious and I'll feel it.
I will forget my years with you,
I will hide your heart in my eyes,
you're the one who my longings and feelings called for,
and my soul is yours.
When my eyes are close to yours, I ask where you've always been,
the most beautiful love is between you and me.
Let me stay in your heart, i've gone crazy over you Yes I love you,
Let me, my dear, live next to you, and let us be together.
When my eyes are close to yours, I ask where you've always been,
the most beautiful love is between you and me.
Let me stay in your heart, i've gone crazy over you Yes I love you,
Let me, my dear, live next to you, and let us be together.
At night when you're with me..
With you I'll live the most precious story.

arabic.title: واحلم ليه
text: وحلم ليه وانا وياك
دنا لامس بأيدي ملاك واتمنى أيه ياحبيبي
وانت ادام عنيا
ولا حسيت غرام قبليك ولا عرفتو الا جوا عنيك
حبيبي خلاص بقيت انا ليك وانت بقيت ليه
مايهمنيش الي فات من عمري ايه
والي فاضل ليه فيي انا عايشو ليك
وانا بين اديك اي شي مايهمنيش اصلى كنت هموت واعيش عمري لعنيك

english.title: Wa7lam Leh
text: And why i'd dream while i am with you
I am touching in my hand an angel and what i'd wish my beloved
And you're in front of my eyes
Never felt passion and never know it but inside your eyes
my beloved finally i became for you and you're for me
I do not care what has gone of my life
And the rest of it i'll live it for you
While i am between your hands i do not care about anything because i was going to die and live my life for your eyes

arabic.title: وانت معايا
text: VAS-Y TAMER
حبيبي خالد
Yo
Yo Yo
C'est Parti
بارك الله عليك
وليه يخليك
ده أنا عايش ليك
ولعنيك يا عمري
يعلم الله اللي في قلبي
أنا والله والله فرحان
ألف بلاد عشان حبي
وأجيله لو في أبعد مكان
يعلم الله باللي في قلبي
أنا والله والله فرحان

الله الله يا حبيبي

الله الله يا حبيبي
هالله هالله هالله

انت اللي بتمناه
واديني اهوه بقولها
مبغيتش نضيع ثانية
بلا بيك يا عمري
يا حبيبي أنا ليك
طمن قلبك

أنا على حبي

يا حبيبي أنا ليك
طمن قلبك
هفضل أحبك toute ma vie
يا ليل يا ليل يا ليل
وانت معايا

english.title: When You are With me
text: C'mon Tamer!
oh, my dear Khaled
Yo
Yo yo
Let's go!
May God bless you
and keep you safe for me
I live my life for you
and for your eyes, my darling
God knows what's in my heart
I swear I am happy
I would travel through lands for my love
And go to her even in the furthest place
God knows what's in my heart
I swear I am happy
I would travel through lands for my love
And go to her even in the furthest place
Oh, oh, darling,
how beautiful, how beautiful
are the emotions I feel when you are with me
Oh, oh, darling,
how beautiful, how beautiful
I feel so much when you are with me
You are the one I wish for
And here I am, saying it
I don't want to waste a second
without you, my darling
Oh my darling, I am yours
Set your heart at ease
I will love you for my entire life
And I even have told you
of my love
I am fully yours to control
Oh my darling, I am yours
Set your heart at ease
I will love you for my entire life
Oh night, oh night,

arabic.title: وحياة أمي
text: وحياه امى منا سيبك كلها يوم وهكون جيبك
هاعمل قتيل هاعمل مجنون ويانا يانا يانا يا حكايتك
وحياه امى منا سيبك كلها يوم وهكون جيبك
هاعمل قتيل هاعمل مجنون ويانا يانا يانا يا حكايتك
نايمت العجله كده عالجانط وحلفت لاجيبها وحياه طنط
هتروحى مارينا ولا العجمى وراكى لغايه شبرا منط
نايمت العجله كده عالجانط وحلفت لاجيبها وحياه طنط
هتروحى مارينا ولا العجمى وراكى لغايه شبرا منط
وحياه امى منا سيبك كلها يوم وهكون جيبك
هاعمل قتيل هاعمل مجنون ويانا يانا يانا يا حكايتك
اه اه اه يا ليل ليل

arabic.title: ورا الشبابيك
text: من ورا الشبابيك بنداري دموع عنينا
وتجري دموعنا برضه وتمسحهم ايدينا
ونقرب من حاجات ونهرب من حاجات
ونبين حاجات وجرحنا نداريه
ونلبس الوشوش، نزود الرتوش
عشان بقى ميشوفوش الناس جوانا ايه
ونجرى كتير يا دنيا، كتير كتير كتير
وتحفظنا الشوارع من كتر المشاوير
ونرجع كل يوم، ويجي تاني يوم
نغير الوشوش بس بنفس الهدوم
جوانا كمان حاجات تأثر في مرايات
وتمشينا ساعات في طريق طويل بجد
وبتلخبط عيون وبتزغلل عيون
وبتغني العيون لطريق في نهايته سد
ونجرى كتير يا دنيا، كتير كتير كتير
وتحفظنا الشوارع من كتر المشاوير
ونرجع كل يوم ويجي تاني يوم
نغير الوشوش بس بنفس الهدوم

english.title: behind the windows
text: We hide our tears behind the windows
Our tears are still flowing and our hands wiping them away
We are approaching some things, we are running away from some things
We reveal some things and hide our bruises
We wear faces (we wear masks) we increase the touch
So that people can not see within us
We are running very fast
And the streets keep us in the place because of the many journeys
We go back every day and come the next day
We change faces but still have the same clothes
Some things in ours also affect the mirror
And takes us around for hours on a really long road
Eyes up and down and eyes blurred
And eyes are singing a path with the set at the end
We are running very fast
And the streets keep us occupied because of the many journeys
We go back every day and come the next day
We change faces but still have the same clothes

arabic.title: ورد صناعي
text: فكرت كتير قبل ما اجي
يا ترى اقولك ولا لأ
قررت أقول خلاص عادي
لأني فعلًا عندي حق
إنت أغرب حاجة عرفتها
إنت صفحة سودة قفلتها
صدمة عمري بأمانة
فترة ذل ومهانة
يا أكتر سيرة كرهتها
كنت دائي وبغبائي بتحمل وأعاني
كنت بلغي كبريائي وأقول هيتغير عشاني
تحت شعار الحب كنت مش شايف انتي
اتاريني ظالم نفسي وكنت بقلل من كرامتي
وبالنسبة لعمري اللي فات
تروح في داهية الذكريات
ومش هقول إني ندمت
عشان بجد أنا اتعلمت
فكرة انك تستنى الاحساس من اي حد
زي ما تسقي ورد صناعي
وتستناه يكبر بجد

english.title: Plastic flowers
text: I thought it over and over before I came here
if I shall tell you or not
I decided it's alright to say it
because I'm actually right
you're the strangest thing I've known
you're a black page that I've turned
the shock of a lifetime, in all honesty.
A period of humiliation and mistreatment
you're my most hated tale
you were my sickness, and with my foolishness I kept taking it and suffer
I canceled my pride and told myself that she's going to change for me
under the claim of love, I wasn't seeing You
Turned out I was unjust toward myself and I was degrading it
and as for what's passed of my life
to hell with the memories
and I won't say that I regret it
because I really learned
that waiting for someone to feel
is like watering fake flowers
and waiting for them to actually grow

arabic.title: ولا يوم من ايامه
text: مين ينسي ذكرياته
وأجمل حب في حياته
ومش بيحن ليه
ومش بيحن ليه
في ناس عايشه فينا
لو مش قدام عينينا
خيالنا عايشين فيه
خيالنا عايشين فيه
في حاجات لما تسيبها
وتروح منك ساعتها
تعرف حقيقي قيمتها
لما تغيب عليك
ولا يوم من ايامه
دا اللي باقيلي منه
هوا كلامي عنه
بعيش عليه
أنا لسه بتمناك
ولا عمري حاولت انساك
وانت عارف كدة
أيوة عارف كدة
وعارف مكاني فاضي
وانك عايش على الماضي
فكرك هنرجع بقى
لازم نرجع بقى
مهو يا أجيلك يا تجيلي
وترجع تنور ليلي
هتجنن و يا ويلي
واحشني وهموت عليه

english.title: None of those days
text: Who forgets memories?
Or the most beautiful love in life?
And will not be kind to?
There are people who live inside us,
Even if they are not in front of our eyrs,
They live in our thoughts,
There things that when you leave them,
And go awsy for a time
You will realize their real price
None of those days
But this is left of them for me
A passionate word from me to her
I live for it
I just want you
And I never tried to forget you
And you know it
Yes that is it
I know you put no one in my place
And you live in the past(times we were together)
And think of returning to each other
That's necessary to return to each other
So I will bring you back or you bring me back,
Come back and light up my nights,
Will be driving crazy
You made me miss you and I die for you.

arabic.title: ونجحنا السنادي

وعقبال كل السنين
فى نجاح على طول مش عادى
فرحانين ومتجمعين

arabic.title: ونجحنا السنة دى

الف مية مليون مبروك على كل واحد ناجح فينا
كل دول كدة بيحبوك وبيهنوك فرحت عنينا
بعد تعب وسهر وليالى
والله فرحنا كدة بالغالى
واللى مافرحش السنة دى هيعوضها ان شاء الله
قول ان شالله ان شالله
قول ان شالله وسيبها على الله

arabic.title: يا أنا يا مفيش
text: ياأنا يا مفيش اصل معنديش فى الحب هزار
يا أنا يا بلاش ومتحسبهاش مفيهاش اعذار
أنا اللى اقول فين وامتى وانا اللى اختار
لو حد نداك اعمل مش سامع برضاك انا قولت كلامى وده نظامى ومش باقى كلام
انا مش مضمون انا ممكن اقلب مجنون لو شوفتك مع غيرى يا ويلك مش هابقى تمام
انا جيت خلاص راحت خلاص ايام زمان
ولا فى كلام ولا حتى سلام غير باستأذان
لا تقولى عشرة ولا قريبى هتلاقى جنان
لو حد نداك اعمل مش سامع برضاك انا قولت كلامى وده نظامى ومش باقى كلام
انا مش مضمون انا ممكن اقلب مجنون لو شوفتك مع غيرى يا ويلك مش هابقى تمام

english.title: Either me or nothing
text: Either me or nothing, I don't joke around when it comes to love. Either me or never mind and don't count it there are no excuses. I say where and when and I chose. If anyone calls you, make yourself as if you didn't hear by your choice. I said my words and there's nothing left to say there's nothing left to say.

I'm not guaranteed, I could turn crazy. If I saw you with someone else beware! I won't be okay. I won't be okay... If anyone calls you, make yourself as if you didn't hear by your choice. I said my words and there's nothing left to say there's nothing left to say. I'm not guaranteed, I could turn crazy. If I saw you with someone else beware! I won't be okay. I won't be okay... I'm here now and that's it, the old days are gone, there is no talking or even waving without my permission, don't tell me you've known him for a long time or that he's your relative, you'll find craziness... If anyone calls you, make yourself as if you didn't hear by your choice. I said my words and there's nothing left to say there's nothing left to say.

arabic.title: يا بعيد
text: يا بعيد من بعيد لبعيد
ببعت سلام بالعين قبل السلام بالإيد
يا بعيد بدعي بالأوقات
يقصروا المسافات ويقربوا المواعيد
ليك ناس فاكراك هنا ولًا كنت هناك
هتغيب ماتغيب والله ف سماه ما انساك
آه يا بعيد شوف انت فين وانا فين
يا حبيبى الله يعين دي الفرقه صعبة أكيد
آه، معقول الود مش موصول؟
البعد مش مقبول، مش حمل بعد جديد
ومنين تيجي راحة البال
وانا شوقي ليك عمال يوم بعد يوم بيزيد
لو فين غيرك ماليش غاليين
مهما يلوموا اللايمين شايلك في قلبي أكيد
ليك ناس فاكراك هنا ولًا كنت هناك
هتغيب ماتغيب والله ف سماه ما انساك
آه يا بعيد شوف انت فين وانا فين

آه، معقول الود مش موصول؟
البعد مش مقبول، مش حمل بعد جديد

english.title: Oh far
text: Oh You in the far,farther and farther.
I send you greeting with the eyes,before greetings with the hand.
Oh far! I pray sometimes.
The distance gets shorter and times gets closer.
There're people here think about you,and you're away.
Even if you choose to stay far,I swear to Allah in the heavens that I will never forget you.
Oh You in far,Look where I'm and where you are.
My love!God helps me,separation is not easy for sure.
Oh I can't belive that our love is not connected.
Distance is by all means not accepted,I can't handle distances.
My mind will never be in peace.
Missing you Grows more painful day after day.
There is no one ever as precious to me as you are.
No matter how much people blame,I hold you dear in my heart,that's for sure.
There're people here think about you,and you're away.
Even if you choose to stay far,I swear to Allah in the heavens that I will never forget you.
Oh You in far,Look where I'm and where you are.
My love!God helps me,separation is not easy for sure.
Oh I can't belive that our love is not connected.
Distance is by all means not accepted,I can't handle distances.

arabic.title: يا حبيبي لو حكون غير ليك
text: يا حبيبى انا لو هكون غير ليك
طب اعيش لمين انا
دى اللحظة حبيبى وانت بعيد
بتفوت يجى مية سنه
يا حبيبى انا لو هكون غير ليك
طب اعيش لمين انا
دى اللحظة حبيبى وانت بعيد
بتفوت يجى مية سنه

من كتر حبيبى حبى انا فيك الحلم انا بحلموا

english.title: If I be for someone except you my darling
text: If I be for someone except you my darling
For who should I live so?
Now that you are far away from me
Every second passes as long as 100 years!
When I see my dear's eyes
My day starts
And feel i am reborn
And smile comes on my face
I love you so much that you are like a dream that I see to me
And as I start dreaming your face appears and completes it.

arabic.title: يا ريته يستاهل
text: وانا بعمل فى نفسى كده ليه
وعشان ايه انا ليه فى حقى بتساهل
هو العمر فيه اصلا ايه عشان
ابكى عليه وياريته حد يستاهل
كنت عايش ايوة عايش تحت امره
ولما كان يقسى كنت اقول حبيبى وبراحته
وهو عايش ايوة عايش وبعد عشرة عمر
يطلع حبنى قوى قوى بس علشان مصلحته
وانا بعمل فى نفسى كده ليه
وعشان ايه انا ليه فى حقى بتساهل

مفيش فى الدنيا حد بيتعلم كده ببلاش

مفيش فى حياتى حد خلاص

arabic.title: يا عيون
text: يا قلبي الحظ نادى عليك
وجابهالك زي ما الحلم كان بيقول
حقيقة بجد مش معقول، دي هيا حبيبتي بالأوصاف
حقيقة واحلى م اللي اتشاف
دي جيالك وانسي يا قلبى تاني تخاف
يا قلبى الدنيا راضيه عليك
و عايزالك تعوض كل حلم وراح
وجالك يوم عشان ترتاح، وتلقى اللى انت مستنيه
مع الحضن اللى نفسك فيه
دي جايالك ومش عايز تصدق ليه!
يا عيون انا بيها بقيت مجنون، ولا كانت ولا هتكون
وكإنك جاية عشاني م الجنة
يا عيون ماليالي الدنيا ورود، ومعاها بقيت موجود
تستاهل فعلاً قلبي اللي استنى
قابلت وعينى شافوا كتير ولا اشتاقوا
وقلت لقلبي مهما يغيب، أكيد هيجيلي أحلي نصيب
فضلت لوحدي واستنيت
عنيكي يشوفوا عيني ياريت لو اتقابلوا
فهمت يا قلبي ليه استنيت؟
بشوفك جاية ببقى هطير
جوايا بقول على نفسي انا محظوظ
ساعدني الحظ بيها افوز، جميلة بجد شكل وروح
وجودي معاها أحلى طموح
آهي معايا ومش هسمح لحلمي يروح

english.title: those eyes
text: My heart,chance called upon you and brought her to you
like in the dream
Is it real,no way;
this is my sweetheart as I imagined and she is real
and she is so beautiful more than all my expectations
she is coming to you ,Dont ever be afraid any more
my heart ,life is good to you
and wants to make up for every lost dream
and it is time for you to rest
and find what you want most
in the arms of whom you have been waiting for
why wont you believe it
those eyes that drove me insane,
those eyes are like no other
as if heaven has sent you to me
those eyes fill my life with roses
and I find myself only with them
really deserve my heart that has been waiting
I have met and my eyes saw a lot of people
but never have been attracted to anyone
I told my heart dont worry even if we will wait for a while
Im sure I will have the best suitor
I was alone and waited hoping for your eyes to see mine
and now that they have met,
do you now understand now my heart ,why I waited?
when I see you coming ,I feel like I have wings to fly
I tell myself that I am lucky
Luck has been on my side to win her heart
Genuinely beautiful inside and out
being with her is the best aspiration
now that she's here with me,
I will not let my dream go away

arabic.title: يا مالي عيني
text: حياتي واقفة عليك من حبي فيك، الله يعيني
حبك عاملي مشكلة هتشوفلي حل فيها
حبيبي شوف طريقة
قلبي الحقيقة جاب آخره مني
مش انت برضو عايزني ليك؟ ماتيلّا احنا فيها
نار نار نار نار جوة مني قايدة
نار نار نار نار جوة و اعمل ايه
حبيته ومستني يحس بيا
و يرحم عذابي عذابي م اللي انا عايش فيه
يا مالى عينى نار نار نار
تفاصيل فيك انت، آه منك انت، حليت سنيني
ريحلي قلبي عوضلي تعبي سايبني ليه بعاني!
ولا غيرك لازمني وانت فاهمني، يا مالي عيني
انت اللي زيك ييجي مرة وصعب ييجي تاني
نار نار نار نار جوة مني قايدة
نار نار نار نار جوة و اعمل ايه
حبيته ومستني يحس بيا
و يرحم عذابي عذابي م اللي انا عايش فيه

My beloved,try to find a way,

english.title: The Light of my Eyes
text: My love come here, I am calling out to you
to reassure me, to comfort me
Never let go of my hands
Don't leave me, even for a second
Hug me, make me forget the world
And promise me that as long as you are with me
you'll never let go of my hands.
The light of my eyes
hug me, feel me
My Love... My Love
With you I will be able to continue
and no matter who hurts me I will endure it
For you, my love
I willing to die for real.
The light of my eyes
hug me, feel me

english.title: Ya Nour Ainy
text: My darling come
I'm calling out to you
You reassure me and calm me
Don't let go of my hand
Don't go away or leave
Hold me close and made me forget the world
And promise me that as long as you're with me
You won't let go of my hand
Oh light of my eye
Hold me
Feel me
Oh light of my eye
Hold me
Feel me
My darling, my darling
With you I can walk and be complete
And if someone hurt me I'll bear it
Because of your eyes my darling
I'll die but truly I won't leave you

english.title: Nour Eini
text: Come here my love ... reasure me , comfort me
Don't let my hand go off your hand
Don't go away not even for a second ....
Hold me let me forget my life
And promise me that you will never let my hand go ....
You who are the light of my eyes ... Hold me ... feel me
My love ...
With you I will be able to go on with my life ...
And no matter who hurts me i will tolerate
because of your eyes my love ...
I would rather die than leaving you
You who are the light of my eyes ... Hold me ... feel me
My love ...

arabic.title: يا واحشني
text: كل يوم بيفوت عليا
ليك بحن فى كل ثانيه
صعب اعيش فى الدنيا الا بيك
احساسى انك حبيبى
وانى مش شيفك بعينى
قد ايه مشتاق لحضنك مش لقيك
حتى وانت بعيد عليا
لسه بتحلم بيك عنيا

arabic.title: ياحبيبى شوف
text: ياحبيبى شوف بقى عندى كام سنة

english.title: Look my dear
text: Look my dear how old I am.
But with you I feel my age becomes less!
That's not important that life passes and we seem tired
Make me tired in order to live relax and calm my life
Days have a different taste and atmosphere with you
You are special to me and i will love Noone after you
Come and embrace me make me forget the world and its belongs
To the end I will be in love with the path you walk on,
My heart is created for you, my life is dedicated to you
God keeps you for me, the meaning of my life

arabic.title: يانا يانا
text: وأخيرا خدت بالي ولا كان يخطر على بالي
وانا برضه بقول كان مالك نظراتك مش طبيعية
تشوفيني يتغير حالك واتاريكي معجبه بيا
وبرغم انك حلوة وطعمة وفيكي أحلى الصفات
وبرغم إنك فعلاً أجمل واحدة في كل البنات
قلبي مشغول بغيرك ... وبحب واحدة غيرك
يمكن مش أحلى منك لكن مالية عينيا
يانا يانا .. يانا يانا .. يا نا يا نا ويا نا ويانا
في حاجات وغايبة عنك أنا واخد عهد منها
مستحيل أعيش من غيرها ولا هقدر يوم أخونها
وفري جمالك لغيري..... هيه مالية الكون عليا
يانا يانا .. يانا يانا .. يا نا يا نا ويا نا ويانا
لو حكيتلك عنها يمكن الكلام مش راح يعبر
لو حاولتي معايا أكتر سحرك انتى مش هيقدر
مش هيقدر ياخدني منها ...... ده أنا ليها وهيه ليا
يانا يانا .. يانا يانا .. يا نا يا نا ويا نا ويان

If you tried with me all your charm wouldn't be able to

arabic.title: يعني خلاص
text: انا عارف انك عايز تسيبني

english.title: So It's Over
text: I know that you want to leave me
leave me, and don't try to sweet talk it

so it's over, I mean nothing anymore
so no longer
my tears affect you
ok, but before you leave let me
cry in your arms for a while
what tires me and tortures me
is not that you'll forget me
but it's that what was between us will be
between you and someone else
so it's over, I mean nothing anymore
so no longer
my tears affect you

cry in your arms for a while

arabic.title: يوم ورا يوم
text: الناس شايفينك بطريقة وانا لوحدى شايفك بطريقة
دايما عايزين منك حاجة وكله بيتعامل بسذاجة
شايفنيك كد من براكى ومحدش شاف ايه جواكى
بتحسي بايه وانتى لوحدك واللى بتحلمى بيه وفى نفسك
مين الانسان اللى لحد دلوقتى مهزش مرة عواطفك
دايبين فى عنيكى و لون شعرك ومحدش بيراعى مشاعرك
اللى انت حبيبى بتقوله جوايا وكان نفسى تقوله
انا نفسى فى حياتى محدش غيرك يسكن عمرى بطوله
انا روحى اتخلقت علشانك ومكانى فى الدنيا مكانك
بصراحة هموت انا على اليوم ده
اللى هكون انا فى حضنك ياه يا حبيبى
شايف فى عينى ضعفى وشوقى و كل حنينى
قدامك يا ابو احلى عيون ياللى علشان عمرى يهون
و يوم ورا يوم حبك بيزيد كل يوم وعشانك مبدوقش النوم  و عشانك ما بدوقش النوم
خليك بين ايدى متسبنيش لحظة يا حبيبى انا هلغى حياتى ومواعيدى انا هلغى حياتى ومواعيدى
اطمن ايوة اطمن ناوية انا اكمل عمرى معاك
والليلة ايوة الليلة هبدا عمرى الجاى فى هواك
مطمن انا مطمن مين فى الدنيا يبقى معاك
ويكون كده مش مطمن
ده انا يا حبيبى عايش لهواك
واخيرا ولأول مرة انسان مش شايفك من بره
انسان حس بقلبك قبل ما عينه تشوفك يا ملاك
آآآه بحبك  آآآه بحبك
انا هلغي حياتي و مواعيدي  انا هلغي حياتي و مواعيدي
يوم ورا يوم حبك بيزيد كل يوم وعشانك مبدوقش النوم  و عشانك ما بدوقش النوم
اطمن ايوة اطمن ناوية انا اكمل عمرى معاك
من الليلة ايوة الليلة هبدا عمرى الجاى انا فى هواك
مطمن انا مطمن مين فى الدنيا يبقا معاك
ويكون كده مش مطمن ده انا يا حبيبى عايش لهواك

english.title: Day after day
text: People see you in one way and I, alone, see you in another way. They always want something from you and everyone treats you with naivety. They only see you from the outside and no one saw what's inside. What do you feel when you're alone and what do you dream about and wish for? Who is the only person that until now hasn't hurt you feeling? People are obsessed with your eyes and haircolor but no one cares for your feelings.

Baby, what you are saying is inside of me and I've been hoping you would say it. I wish for a life in which no one but you lives in it with me. My soul was created for you and my place in this world is yours... To tell you the truth I'll die for this day that I will be in your lap, Oh baby, you see in my eyes my weaknesses and my longings and all of my cravings in front of you, Oh man with the most beautiful eyes, who for you my life plays..

Day after day, your love increases every day, and because of you I don't taste sleep, and because of you I don't taste sleep... Stay in my hands, don't ever leave me baby, I'll cancel my life and appointments, I'll cancel my life and appointments... Don't worry, yes don't worry, I'm willing to finish my life with you... From this night, yes this night, I'll begin my coming life with you... Finally, and for the same time someone hasn't seen you from the outside, someone has felt you heart before his eyes have seen you oh angel... OOh I love you... Oooh I love you.. I'll cancel my life and appointments, I'll cancel my life and appointments... Day after day, your love increases... and because of you... and because of you I don't taste sleep... Don't worry, yes don't worry, I'm willing to finish my life with you... From this night, yes this night, I'll begin my coming life with you... I'm not worrying who in this world can be with you and worries, baby I live for you....

arabic.title: ١٠٠ وش
text: اعزائي الغدارين
اللي غدروا بمحبتنا
روحوا ورب العباد
يديكوا على قد نيتكو من ناحيتنا
من كتر الناس اللي ب ١٠٠ وش
وحشونا الناس اللي بوشين
سامحونا غلطنا خلاص معلش
حرمنا خلاص احنا آسفين
اللهم احفظنا
من القريب قبل الغريب
واحفظنا من اللي حافظنا
وكارهنا وعامل حبيب
ياه سواد سواد
مفيش رحمة
والطيبة تاهت في الزحمة
حلوة ومرة كنا سوا
وقلوبكو بينا كانت تحس
قلوبنا ليه دلوقتي ليه
بنشوفكوا في الحلوة وبس؟
وشين وشين
عادي وايه يعني
عالأقل كانوا واضحين
وشين وشين
عادي وايه يعني يعني عادي
بس كانوا بني آدمين
يا عين يا ليل يا ليل
فين الصحاب؟
فين الأمان؟
مش انت صاحبي
ولا حبيبي بتاع زمان
بتبقى جنبي بتشكر فيا
وباين في عينك عكس الكلام
أنا كل يوم بفكر
بعدتوا عنا ليه؟
ما بعرفش أنام
لحد ما جت في دماغي
دعوة أمي
لما كانت تدعيلي وتقولي
روح يبني
يبعد عنك ولاد الحرام

english.title: A Hundred Faces
text: Dear treacherous people
who sold out our love
I pray that God
would give you exactly what you deserve
Because there are so many people with a hundred faces
We actually miss two-faced people
Forgive us, we made a mistake, we're sorry
We won't do it again, we apologize
Oh God protect us
from the people who are around us, even more than from strangers
And protect us from the ones who know us well,
And hate us but pretend to love us
Oh, so much darkness and many grudges
And there's no mercy
Kindness is lost in all this chaos
We used to be together, in happy and sad times
And your hearts used to feel ours
Why do our hearts now
only see you in our happy times?
Two faces, two faces
So what, it's fine
At least those people were clear
Two faces, two faces
So what, it's fine
But at least they used to be humans
oh eye, oh night1
Where are friends?
Where is safety?
You are not my friend
nor the one I loved and knew long ago
When you are by my side you praise me
But the opposite of your words is apparent in your eyes
Every day I think,
Why did you go away from us?
I couldn't sleep
Until I suddenly remembered
My mother's prayer
When she used to pray for me and tell me
Oh son I pray,
for God to keep the people with bad intentions away from you

english.title: My Mother Then My Mother
text: After this love
What does she does all of this deserve
After this love, what
She who gives affection like this without asking for anything in return
We kiss the ground she walks upon
My mother, and then, my mother
To the last day of my life
Love from the first moment of my life
And her concern is mine
She who's goodness is bountiful
Her goodness melted into my blood and I live with it
After the mother what else is there?
With a sweet call opening the locked gate
After the mother what else is there?
She calms your mind when it is struggling
And shows you the whole world is open to you and satisfies you
I give a representation of her
Her heart is unimaginably good
I give a representation of her
She who stayed up late and tired and raised me and carried a mountain
You start a hundred thousands celebrations in me
Who in my exhaustion stayed up and did not sleep
Who supported me the first time I walked
After what you've done what can I do?
The day you brought me into this world
AFter what you've done
From your sympathy from your forgiveness
Heaven is beneath you
This what our lord said (it's in the Quran)
I love you my mother
Til the very last day of my life

arabic.title: بكره
text: جايى بكرا نهار جديد، نفرح فيه ويفرح فينا
نزرع الأرض مواعيد وحب أمل وين ما مشينا
بكرا تجمعنا الأيام على الخير وع السلام
نبنى سوا سوا، سوا منلون الكون بأغانينا
مين قال ما نقدر نغير وجه الكون
شو ماتقول لو محينا، الظلمه بصباحات اللون
آمن! ع كل المفارق، تضحك إلنا الطرقات
آمن حتى حد ما دايس دوسه غيمه ب هالحياه
جايى بكرا نهار جديد، نفرح فيه ويفرح فينا
نزرع الأرض مواعيد وحب أمل وين ما مشينا
بكرا تجمعنا الأيام على الخير وع السلام
نبنى سوا سوا، سوا منلون الكون بأغانينا
نقدر نوصل حد الشمس اللى نحتاجه الإيمان
الحب ونكران النفس وصداقه كل الاديان
من كل عرق وكل جنس صحى ضميرك يا انسان
بكره اللمه الحلوه تعود ونزرع كل الارض ورود
جايى بكرا نهار جديد، نفرح فيه ويفرح فينا
نزرع الأرض مواعيد وحب أمل وين ما مشينا
بكرا تجمعنا الأيام على الخير وع السلام
نبنى سوا سوا، سوا منلون الكون بأغانينا
بكره يومك يا بلادى نملى الفرحه ف كل مكان
نبنى مستقبل لولادى يعيشوا بخير وامان
جايى بكرا نهار جديد، نفرح فيه ويفرح فينا
نزرع الأرض مواعيد وحب أمل وين ما مشينا
بكرا تجمعنا الأيام على الخير وع السلام
نبنى سوا سوا، سوا منلون الكون بأغانينا
كلما صباح يهدينا وردى وشمس نهار جديد
صوت اللى جاى يودينا مهما بكره يكون بعيد
فى أحلام بتناجينا و فى ضحكه بتنادينا
والاحزان نقدر بايدينا نغيرها وتتحول عيد
نحن صوت الخير شمس الأيام
نحن يوم جديد ، راية سلام
نحن نايات الحب وروح الأنغام
نحن ألف ليلى وليلى من شرق الأحلام
مستنينا جناح الهوا بكره نكون احلا سوا
افتح ابواب الامل ليل العتمه انتهى
احنا ولادك يا بلاد يا بلاد يا بلاد يا بلاد
يا شمس يا شموسه يا حلوه يا عروسه
نتمنى بكرا السلام ينور علينا شموسه
وانا اصحابى الحلوين احمد وعيسى وموسى
واطفال العالم كله خد السلام نبوسه
جاى بكره نهار جديد نفرح بيه وبيفرح بينا
نزرع الارض مواعيد حب وامل وين ما مشينا
بكره تجمعنا الايام ع الخير وع السلام
نبنى سوا سوا ونلون الكون باغانينا
جايى بكرا نهار جديد، نفرح فيه ويفرح فينا
نزرع الأرض مواعيد وحب أمل وين ما مشينا
بكرا تجمعنا الأيام على الخير وع السلام
نبنى سوا سوا، سوا منلون الكون بأغانينا
جايى بكرا نهار جديد، نفرح فيه ويفرح فينا
نزرع الأرض مواعيد وحب أمل وين ما مشينا
بكرا تجمعنا الأيام على الخير وع السلام
نبنى سوا سوا، سوا منلون الكون بأغانينا
يا بلاااااااااااااأأأأدى بحبك يا بلاااااااااااااااادى
ااااااااااااااه بحبك يا بلادى
جاى بكره نهار جديد

english.title: Tomorrow
text: Tomorrow comes another day;
happy with us, to give us joy.
Plant life with expectations,
Love and hope wherever we go.
Tomorrow, days will bring us together
In goodness and peace.
Oh, World! Together, together , together
We'll colour the universe with our songs.
Who says we can't
Change the face of the world?
What do you say we erase
Darkness with the colours of the morning.
Believe! At all the crossroads,
The roads will smile for us;
Believe! No one will pass
Like a cloud in this life.
Tomorrow comes another day;
happy with us, to give us joy.
Plant life with expectations,
Love and hope wherever we go.
Tomorrow, days will bring us together
In goodness and peace.
Oh, World! Together, together , together
We'll colour the universe with our songs.
We can reach the sun,
All we need is faith;
Love and selflessness,
And friendship among all religions.
Among every race and creed,
Awaken your conscience humans.
Tomorrow the sweet gathering return,
And we'll plant the land with roses
Tomorrow comes another day;
happy with us, to give us joy.
Plant life with expectations,
Love and hope wherever we go.
Tomorrow, days will bring us together
In goodness and peace.
Oh, World! Together, together , together
We'll colour the universe with our songs.
Tomorrow is your day my country.
We'll spread joy everywhere.
We'll build a future for our children
To live and prosper in peace.
If we try we can fly
to a whole 'nother place
And we're never never never too far
from tomorrow, today
Tomorrow comes another day;
happy with us, to give us joy.
Plant life with expectations,
Love and hope wherever we go.
Tomorrow, days will bring us together
In goodness and peace.
Oh, World! Together, together , together
We'll colour the universe with our songs.
Whenever a morning gifts us,
Roses, the sun and a new day;
Taking us towards the future,
No matter how far tomorrow seems;
Our dreams keep us going,
Our laughter bids us
Sorrow, we can turn with our hands
And make it joy.
We are the voice of goodness,
We are the light of day.
We are a new day,
we are a banner for peace.
We are the flute of love,
we are the soul of music.
We are a thousand nights
from the East of dreams.
The wings of love await us,
Tomorrow we are better together.
Open the doors of hope,
The night of darkness has gone.
We are you children, our country.
Oh lovely sun!
Beautiful as a bride!
We Hope for peace tomorrow,
With its sun shining upon us.
Me and all sweet friends,
Mohammad, Jesus and Moses,
All the children of the world,
let's embrace peace.
Tomorrow comes another day;
happy with us, to give us joy.
Plant life with expectations,
Love and hope wherever we go.
Tomorrow, days will bring us together
In goodness and peace.
Oh, World! Together, together , together

arabic.title: قوم اقف
text: عشان اصالحك و ارضى عليك
حجات كثير لازم تعملها
عشان اصالحك و ارضى عليك
حجات كثير و دي اولها
قوم اوقف و انت بتكلمني
قوم اوقف بص لي و فهمني
و لا تتكلم و انا بتكلم
و ان غلطت ابقى امشي و سبني
قوم اوقف و انت بتكلمني
قوم اوقف بص لي و فهمني
انت ليه اه ليه اه ليه انت ليه ما بتحبش
قولي ايه اه ليه اه ليه حتى ما بتسال
و كمان زعلان
لو نسي نعلمو او حتى نفهمو
اللي فاتك من حياتك حعلمهولك
قوم اوقف و انت بتكلمني قوم و اقف بص لي و فهمني
و لا تتكلم وانا بتكلم و ان غلطت ابقى امشي و سبني
قوم اوقف قوم اوقف كلمني
قوم اوقف قوم اوقف فهمني
قوم اوقف و انت بتكلمني
قوم اوقف بص لي و فهمني
ولا تتكلم و انا بتكلم
وان غلطت ابقى امشي و سبني

english.title: Stand Up
text: - For me to forgive you and be pleased with you...
- ...you must do a lot of things
- For me to forgive you and be pleased with you...
- (you must do) a lot of things and here is the first...
(CHORUS:
- Stand up when you are talking to me.
- Stand up, look me in the eye and explain/be thorough with me.)
- And don't talk while I'm talking
- And if I'm wrong then walk away and leave me
-CHORUS (2x)
- Why...why...why
- Why do you hate hearing that you are wrong?
- tell me why... why... why
- tell me why, you don't even ask (about me) and yet you are angry
- if they (your parents) forgot to teach you or even explain to you (2x)
- what you were never taught in your life
- what you were never taught in your life, I will teach you it myself.
-CHORUS(2x)
- And don't talk while I'm talking
- And if I'm wrong then walk away and leave me
-CHORUS(2x)
